name: PilotXross
description: VR flight game developed for VR devices.The player becomes a [Pilot] flying in the sky with a VRM model, wearing an equipment called [Xross], you can enjoy various ways of flying. The fastest time is to take a commemorative photo and share it on SNS!

name: NeptuneGL
description: Enjoy the thrill of the hunt in this 6 degree of freedom space shooter with immersive graphics and multiplayer.

name: Bad Girl
description: Bad Girl - Hardcore platformer made in the old-school style where there is nothing superfluous

name: Loop Craft
description: Loop Craft is a game about economics. There is an item trading system within the game. This game has a variety of item mix systems. And have a reservation system to set up a factory to produce products for sale in the game.

name: In the Valley of Gods
description: In the Valley of Gods is a single-player first person video game set in Egypt in the 1920s. You play as an explorer and filmmaker who, along with your old partner, has traveled to the middle of the desert in the hopes of making a seemingly-impossible discovery and an incredible film.

name: Plague Hunter
description: Plague Hunter is an indie platformer game in the dark fantasy vein. In the game you’ll be using sword and gun to cut your way through hordes of zombies and other terrible monsters, avoiding deadly traps.

name: Frond Online
description: Frond Online will be a game in the acclaimed MMORPG style, developed in Unreal Engine 5. It will feature a 3D view. Players will need to evolve their characters to explore increasingly challenging areas. Player characters must enhance their attributes and skills as they gain experience and levels, as well as acquire new equipment and relics scattered throughout the world. Each player can join groups and/or guilds, meeting new people or playing with friends, to develop and explore the world together. As a 'Game as a Service,' the promise is that there will always be new content released periodically, keeping players entertained and excited to explore and discover new places and challenges.

name: Threat Vector
description: Battle across the solar system as annihilation looms over mankind in this action sci-fi horror FPS. Powered by id Tech, THREAT VECTOR delivers classic FPS combat throughout a suite of concise, potent levels infested with deadly horrors… and loaded with enough firepower to destroy them all.

name: The God Slayer
description: The God Slayer is an open-world action RPG featuring a highly immersive gameplay system and story experience, allowing players to enhance their abilities through battles and world exploration with the ultimate goal of defeating enemies and saving the world.

name: Hanoi Puzzles: Spin Match
description: Inspired by the classic Tower of Hanoi, Assemble towers by spinning pieces to get the right pattern on a hexagonal board with a mysterious and relaxing atmosphere.

name: Arma 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Constellations: Beyond the Edges
description: After an accident at a space station, you lose all communication with the earth and are no longer able to locate yourself in space, your best chance of returning is to use the space monitoring system to identify known constellations and configure the route back home.

name: A Wake Inn: Rebooked
description:
They say bad things happen in Silver Inn Hotel. Strange noises. Mysterious flashing lights in the night. Weird figures slithering in the dark.

They say something is about to awake soon. Will you dare to witness it?

A Wake Inn comes for PC in Rebooked version - redesigned, adding new content, additional endings and fully animated models of enemies.

name: Ink Shapes: Book One
description: Rotate stamps to create beautiful watercolor paintings in this relaxing hand-drawn puzzle.

name: Hanoi Puzzles: Magnetrix
description: Assemble magnetic towers by stacking pieces from opposite poles, to enlighten a electrifying hexagonal board.

name: Clock Overwhelmed
description: Organize tasks within your routine, but be careful not to overlap activities and get overwhelmed!

name: Scramble Heart City
description: From the team behind Tough Love Arena comes Scramble Heart City, an exciting, 3v3 tag team fighting game that's playable in browser — no installation required!

name: Nightborn
description:
Nightborn is an Action RPG with narrative-focused gameplay set in a dark gothic version of our own world.
Players assume the role of the Bloodhound, a Vampire detective trained in tracking supernatural threats to the Nightborn, using arcane rituals forbidden to others of your kind.
Investigate a series of disappearances of your fellow Vampires, including your Maker, a politically influential member of the Nightborn, the Vampire elite of New Orleans.

Create your own Bloodhound character, choosing from 10 iconic Vampire lineages with a set of signature lineage power skill trees.

Lineage powers include physical prowess enhancements, shapeshifting, controlling the minds of mortals, and acts of eldritch sorcery.

Fuel Vampire powers by preying upon mortals via stealth, seduction, or brute force.

Elude Mortal Law Enforcement and Monster Hunters, masking your dark nature.

Solve the mysteries of gothic New Orleans by taking quests, discovering clues, and exploring the supernatural underworld.

Battle, evade, or outwit, natural and supernatural foes, using your powers, weapons, and tactics.

Side with a Nightborn faction, the ruling Establishment, the reckless Libertines, or the fanatical Orthodoxy; or eschew them all to forge your own path.

name: Saros
description:
SAROS is the next game from Housemarque, coming to PS5 and PS5 Pro in 2026. Set on the planet Carcosa under the threat of an ominous eclipse, take on the role of Arjun Devraj, a powerful Soltari Enforcer searching for answers on a lost off-world colony.

SAROS features permanent progression systems, where every death reshapes the world while offering new upgrades to overcome challenges. With a haunting story, deep third-person action, and a grounded performance by Rahul Kohli, SAROS presents the next evolution in Housemarque's gameplay-first experience.

name: Lapso
description: Classic survival horror with a modern feel. Solve puzzles, search for items, manage your inventory, and pray you'll return to the safe room alive in this decaying twisted facility consumed by a mysterious metallic corruption.

name: There's Always a Madman: V.I.C.T.O.R.
description:
Secret agent Franklin Benjamin will stop at nothing to save the world.

In the single-player interactive novel villain team-up game "There's Always a Madman: V.I.C.T.O.R.," you play as his greatest adversaries. Can the criminal enterprise known as V.I.C.T.O.R. (short for a "Very Important Collective of Terrorists, Operatives, and Rogues") defeat the only man standing between them and world domination?

To the V.I.C.T.O.R. go the spoils!

name: Liminal Point
description: Classic Survival Horror. Drawn to Ashen Point by a cryptic voicemail, Lyra returns to the island where her band’s story ended in tragedy. Shrouded in fog and prowled by horrors, confront deadly creatures, explore the desolate town, and reveal the truth behind the night that changed everything.

name: Fiefdom
description: Change the world, one battle at a time in FIEFDOM: a multiplayer action melee game set in a playerbase-driven story. Clash swords, cast spells, rain down arrows & more in in battles of up to 100 players both at land & at sea. Dive into a world where your victories define the outcome of entire wars. Who will you be fighting for?

name: Puzkin: Magnetic Odyssey
description: PUZKIN: Magnetic Odyssey invites players to explore a vibrant, magical world where magnetic energy sustains the balance of nature and creatures called Puzzies. Players, embodying chosen children, are transported to this mysterious realm to restore its harmony through epic adventures, collaborative construction, and immersive quests.

name: Screamer
description: High-octane action and anime aesthetics collide in this arcade racing game, featuring fighting mechanics and a storyline that hits hard. In this world, some race for glory while others seek power or revenge. Every race is a fight and every battle is personal.

name: Onimusha: Way of the Sword
description:
Fight through bloodstained battlefields of intense swordplay action. Explore the historic Japanese capital of Edo-era Kyoto, twisted by malevolent clouds of Malice.
With every stage cloaked in mystery, danger and intrigue. Battle against monstrosities from the underworld known as Genma in a tale of dark fantasy.
Follow the tale of a samurai who wields the Oni Gauntlet, a mystical artifact that grants its bearer the power to slay Genma.
Through gritty, blood-soaked brawls, he searches for his reason to fight. What fate awaits at the end of his path?

name: Feltopia
description: In this hand-felted, stop-motion "cute-em-up," the realms of Feltopia have been infected by a mysterious Smog Spirit. Skyrider flies on their pegasus through wondrous landscapes to save their magical sheep, transform creatures, and battle bosses on their quest to uncover Feltopia’s secrets.

name: Take Us North
description: Sin descripción

name: Toem 2
description: Step back into the shoes of a curious photographer and set off on a brand new adventure all about uncovering hidden details, helping friends along the way, and documenting the world’s little wonders in TOEM 2, the sequel to the acclaimed TOEM.

name: Steampunk Shinobi
description: Steampunk Shinobi is a roguelite action game set in a Steampunk/Medieval Japan-inspired world. Play as a lineage of Shinobi, where each death passes the quest to the next generation. Procedurally generated maps evolve with your actions, making every playthrough unique!

name: Chi Project
description: Sci-fi fantasy visual novel that combines a turn-based combat system with murder investigation elements.

name: Danchi Days
description: Laugh, cry, and feel awe in this cute adventure game about inviting characters to a Japanese summer festival! Surf the internet to learn their quirks and desires, then use your senses to uncover the unseen wonders of a Y2K, GBA-inspired world.

name: Animal Use Protocol
description: In this first-person, narrative-focused survival horror, you play as Penn, a hyper-intelligent chimpanzee. Hunted at every turn, your only chance of survival lies in scavenging, crafting, and exploring Anchorage Station. An epic story awaits. Be quick and quiet. Time is running out...

name: Problem Solver Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Lords of the Fallen 2
description: Lords of the Fallen 2, the highly anticipated sequel to the game released in 2023, is set to arrive in 2026. The team at Hexworks aims to create a sequel incorporating more commercial elements, particularly in visual design, to attract a broader audience of players.

name: Nerd: Tracing Dayline
description: An adventure game created with the concept of "a game for a single song."

name: ArcheAge Chronicles
description: Explore Auroria, a vast and vibrant world brimming with rich lore and thrilling action. ArcheAge Chronicles delivers an immersive experience that will capture players' hearts, whether they are newcomers to the setting or seasoned adventurers.

name: Inazuma Eleven Re
description: The story that started Inazuma Eleven will be revived in a remake!

name: Cocoro
description: An upcoming visual novel from Frontwing.

name: Dragons Brew
description: Dragons Brew is a captivating boardgame cafe simulation game where you can create and manage your very own cozy cafe. Drawing inspiration from beloved games like Stardew Valley and Traveller’s Rest, Dragons Brew combines charming pixel art with engaging simulation mechanics.

name: Solar Voltage
description: After a huge solar storm destroyed their ship and left them stranded, help Volt and her crewmates escape the dangerous planet filled with deadly robots and a mysterious AI.

name: Fruit of Choice
description: Casual arcade game. Stay on the move and survive for a long time. Dash to dodge, attack, and explode bombs!

name: Elementalist
description: In this movement puzzle platformer, you have to collect your abilities before using them. Jump, dash, dive, and teleport inside carefully crafted levels, to salvage as many sun fragments as possible.

name: Heart Dungeon
description: Heart Dungeon is a roguelite action game with visual novel elements that follows a boy called Leo who gets inside a video game that manifests elements of the psyche of whoever enters it. He will use this dimension to fight the illness that afflicts his mother and understand what is going on in his own heart.

name: No Vacation for an Executioner
description: It's a a Dark Fantasy Action-RPG about a frustrated executioner in late 17th century. He ran away from the gallows. It aroused a riot of monsters, he had to clean up this cruel mess, and find out the truth of this crazy world.

name: Curilemu
description: Curilemu is an adventure-horror game inspired by the myths and legends of Chilean Patagonia. Immerse yourself in a haunting world filled with Lovecraftian horrors and ancient mysteries. Fight colossal beasts and discover what is behind the plague to heal this island and restore the cosmic balance.

name: Project Dosa
description: Platform through a vibrant world in an upgradeable mech and cook delicious meals. Fight off corpos in turn based combat, discover new recipes, build up your reputation with local communities, and bond with friends and family on a journey to taste everything life has to offer.

name: Dark Crown
description: Dark Crown is a roguelike deckbuilder where a new take on chess meets powerful magical abilities. It's a gloomy and oppressive world, but one that you will conquer by unlocking new cards, improving units, making sacrifices, and tough choices to grow more powerful with each new run.

name: Iridescent
description: Embark on a perilous journey through a plagued empire! Explore a vast world, conquer intricate dungeons and hone your skills against relentless adversaries that stand in your way of finding a cure. Are you capable of seeing this adventure to its end?

name: Blood Peace
description: Blood Peace, a hyper-violent FPS, immerses players in intense cybernetic warfare. Unravel a cryptic story or dive into chaotic action. Hunt Easter eggs, survive diverse environments, and master unique skills. Join the ultimate killing machine in this fast-paced adventure!

name: Polda 8
description: It´s the eight entry in the point and click adventure series Polda and the final game with Pankrác as the main character. Just like previous entries is this one focused on puzzles and crazy humor, however this time there are also action minigames and three controlable characters.

name: Abyss X Zero
description: Explore an expansive world in this 3D Metroidvania with enormous dungeons and stylish combat. Take control of two different characters, fated to battle each other: Codename A and Codename Z, both legendary heroes with unique abilities that change how you fight and interact with the environment.

name: Outbound
description: Build your own home on wheels and live sustainably off-grid. Craft workstations and power supplies, source energy from the sun, wind, or water, upgrade and customize your vehicle, grow crops, automate your production, and explore a colorful world.

name: Exodus
description: Exodus is an epic new sci-fi action-adventure RPG franchise developed by the team at Archetype Entertainment. The story is fueled by the consequences of player choices due to the impact of Time Dilation and how they change the lives of those we love most.

name: Sligga Trigger
description: Suit up and sling some shells at sadistic, superpowered sci-fi slugs. Snag some secrets, suffer some shrapnel, and shoot the shit out of some Sliggas in this one-of-a-kind twin-stick shooter.

name: Untrusted: Hackers at Large
description: In this short single player command line adventure (set in the Untrusted world) you'll be playing as various hackers getting into computer systems to hack, steal and sabotage. Manage your crew to blackmail, extort or murder your targets. Investigate. Hack. Don't Die.

name: Undefeated: Genesis
description: The ultimate superhero experience. Fly freely and unleash your awesome powers as you battle violent mutants to save an alien planet.

name: Mearcair/System Pulse
description: Dive into System Pulse, a rhythm-fueled roguelike bullet heaven where you must outmaneuver swarms of robots moving while attacking to the beat. Unleash your reflexes, survive rhythmic encounters, and master the symphony of chaos in this electrifying action game.

name: Dread Pilots
description: Dread Pilots is a space survival game where you explore a mysterious and hostile pocket universe called the Dread. Scavenge resources, upgrade your ship, make friends, and fight monsters as you try to carve out a little piece of the Dread for yourself.

name: Telluria: Forebodings
description: A 3D graphic adventure with parallel realities, ancient vestiges and dark omens. Play in two worlds and through two ages. Discover the past to shape the future. The fate of Telluria will rest on you.

name: 5 Star Fishy
description: Explore, bite, talk, and swim to the bottom of this semi-linear aquatic metriodvania! The world isn't particularly happy with a tiny pink fishy trying to nuke them, and they may try to kill you, so stay sharp and don't bite off more than you can chew.

name: Forge of the Fae
description: Explore a story-rich, mysterious world inspired by Celtic folklore, use crystals to channel powerful magic, and make impactful choices that change the story's outcome. A unique Crystal System and battles with dangerous Fae await in this charming, pixel-style, retro modern RPG.

name: Moonlight Peaks
description: Experience life as a vampire in Moonlight Peaks! Master the art of potion-making and spell-casting, tend to your supernatural farm, and make your mark on the magical town. Befriend the local werewolves, witches and mermaids, and maybe even find eternal love along the way.

name: DecaPolice
description:
DecaPolice, a crime-suspense RPG from Level-5, developers of the Layton series, will be released on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 and Steam in 2026!

The main character, a rookie detective named Harvard, hunts down criminals in a huge open-world crime-ridden city, traveling back and forth between physical and virtual reality.

name: Thick as Thieves
description: Set in an alternate history Edinburgh, Thick as Thieves throws you into a world of supernatural intrigue. Society’s elite amass wealth and power, while the lower classes struggle to simply survive. It’s time to even the score. Team up with your fellow thieves and relieve the rich of their ill-gotten hoards. You’ll need your wits, a skillful crew and no small amount of luck to pull off daring heists. And if you get filthy rich in the process… who could hold that against you?

name: Paws and Leaves: A Last Tale
description: Life flashes before your eyes when you die. Help Me Fox by finding his memories beyond life and experiencing a touching, cute, and scary tale.

name: Hero Chest
description: The perfect combination of Roguelike, Hack Slash and Card Game! In Hero Chest you are an angry chest that got tired of being looted and decided to finish them all! With powers and special cards create the dungeon and strategize to reach your goal. An adventure full of combat and gold!

name: Replaced
description: Replaced is a 2.5D sci-fi retro-futuristic action platformer where you play as R.E.A.C.H. - an artificial intelligence trapped in a human body against its own will. Replaced combines cinematic platforming, pixel art and free-flow action combat set in an alternative 1980's.

name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
description: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake is a remake of the classic 2003 game of the same title that lead to arguably the most successful reboot of the franchise yet. Announced almost exactly 10 years after the previous AAA Prince of Persia title's release, this game is an attempt to revive the franchise back to life. During it's reveal at Ubisoft Forward (September 2020), the game was given a January 2021 release date, but later it has been confirmed on various social platforms that the game's release has been pushed back indefinitely until further notice.

name: Skyclimbers
description: Build your kingdom, choose your class, and tame monsters in this Multiplayer City-Building/Open-World Action RPG that takes place in a procedurally generated anime-themed metaverse.

name: Nonuple Nine: Asymptote
description: "NONUPLE NINE: Asymptote" is a side-scrolling, narrative Sci-fi adventure game. Control the subject girl and solve the mystery of the building where the same floor loops. With vast scientific insights, can you find the answer for the "meaning of humanity" during this deadly journey?

name: Port Valley
description: Port Valley is a (not so) classic Point & Click game where a certain choice changes everything. Witness 3 points of view of the same story and find out what's really going on during Port Valley's Election Day!

name: Fable
description: A new beginning for the legendary franchise. Explore a land of fantastical creatures and wondrous places.

name: Squadron 42
description: Take the role of a rookie UEE Navy combat pilot in a cinematic single-player epic adventure set in the Star Citizen universe. Battle in the stars and face-to-face as you seamlessly transition between dogfighting and ground combat. Serve aboard a massive Navy capital ship as your custom character interacts and builds relationships with a living, breathing crew. Cutting-edge performance capture brings unprecedented emotion and life to some of your favorite actors. Powered by Lumberyard, Squadron 42 pushes gaming graphics and fidelity to the next level.

name: Former Dawn
description: An upcoming port of Former Dawn for the PC

name: Former Dawn
description:
After a failed terraforming mission on an exoplanet light years from Earth, humanity dies out but leaves behind a child species(called the “Formers”) that forgets its own origin. You play a common hunter who rediscovers the truth and struggles against the faceless Organization which will stop at nothing to defeat you. Along the way, you recruit a motley crew of brave Formers who are willing to risk everything for Justice.

Former Dawn is, in a nutshell, a story of discovery, resistance to evil, and exploration of the human condition. The world is rich, the plot complex, and the characters dynamic and multi-dimensional.

name: Beautiful Light
description: Beautiful Light is a PvPvP(vE) tactical first-person extraction shooter where 6 squads of 3 operators are tasked with entering, securing, and extracting an artifact in a hostile, horrific environment. Face other operators and player-controlled anomalies, but beware: mistakes can risk your life and gear.

name: Knights Province
description:
Become medieval lord. Build and defend your town. Train your army. Conquer the enemies.

Knights Province is intended to be an old-school RTS game. Unlike many modern RTS games, which are fast-paced and often are more about tactics, KP planned to emphasize on “strategy” component. Slower-paced gameplay, base-building, resources collection and processing, in-depth strategic choices, variety of resources and units, attention to details.

name: Grimmlins Tale
description: Grimmlins Tale is an action adventure monster tamer where you catch, train, and bond with all fairy tale inspired monsters. Fight alongside your monster friends in deep, real-time strategic combat, and hop on their backs to explore in the whimsical world of Never Everland.

name: A Forest Tale: Porasy
description:
Embark on a journey through a new mythological realm as Porasy, an Indigenous warrior. Explore uncharted landscapes, unleash the power of Muiraquitãs, unravel your story, and vanquish the Seven Legendary Beasts to carve your own legend. Are you ready to dive into this epic adventure?

Porasy is an indie platformer that combines the thrill of classic 2D action with the rich, untold stories of the Tupi-Guarani mythology. Inspired by childhood favorites like Sonic and MegaMan, Porasy brings a fresh challenge to the platforming genre, immersing players in a dangerous, atmospheric world of Brazilian folklore.

name: Wax Heads
description: A cosy-punk slice-of-life narrative sim about managing a struggling record store. Chat to quirky customers with unique tastes, explore a handcrafted record collection, fall in love with bands (and their drama!), or just slack off with your colleagues – all to restore the groove!

name: The Alchemist
description: Become an Alchemist; explore the Great Wilderness, fight monsters, find ingredients, craft potions & items to sell in your shop, gain power to become a Master Alchemist in the fantasy world of Ethermearial.

name: Waifu Wars Online
description: Kill, loot, and level up with other players in this mysterious online realm. Welcome to WAIFU WARS ONLINE!

name: Love in Space
description: It is the year 2009. A short time after "the incident". Mankind has fled the scorched crusts of planet earth for a better life in space. Those unlucky few who still reside on earth are forced to live beneath the sea in leaky metal domes. This includes you... 50% Visual Novel - 50% Karaoke-Musical.

name: Your Crown Is Mine
description: Take the throne and fix the corrupt kingdom— or worsen it! A villainess life sim and visual novel where you balance your stats and romance rival nations' leaders for foreign policy purposes. How will you rule the country?

name: Coring
description: Coring is a fast-paced, turn-based strategy game with rogue-like elements. Play as Pruner 'III', a reborn entity tasked with severing abnormal branches to protect the World Tree. Piece together memories to uncover the truth of your endless rebirth.

name: Jammer Dash
description: Jammer Dash is a free rhythm 2D game in which you move and destroy objects on beat made for Windows and Linux! Inspired by many awesome games such as Muse Dash, Geometry Dash and osu!. Made in Unity and C#.

name: Silent Planet
description: Silent Planet is an exploration-focused, dark action side-scroller rooted in Cosmic horror. Explore the claustrophobic corridors of a massive underground complex filled with the remnants of technological and biological horrors created by a dead civilization.

name: Peacemaker: Bloody Emperor
description: A dark fantasy JRPG. The imperial princess Chrysoberyl must fight the Bloody Emperor who has usurped the throne. However, her army is small and her allies are conniving. It is a bloody war where she will have to choose between peace and lives...

name: The Last Grape
description: The Last Grape is a game about fruits, vegetables and vengeance. Slice through your enemies with speed and precision in this action, fast paced platform where you control a tiny grape in seek for revenge.

name: Nine Rounds Rapid
description: A fast paced, super stylized, roguelike, twin stick shooter. Nine levels of designed, hand painted and procedurally generated, punchy and punky fast mayhem in a uniquely stunning attitude filled world.

name: Redemption of the Damned
description:
You are a field doctor's assistant who was heading to a distant village to help local peasants. Someone attacked your stagecoach and you wake up in a mass grave, being the only survivor.

The player fights against monsters and other evil spirits in various biomes of the cursed forest, and the only safe place is the village, where he can complete tasks, recuperate or replenish supplies. In each location the player will meet with the guardian of this zone - the boss, who is the iconic character of the folklore of Western and Eastern Europe. The main goal of the game is to get into the high castle in order to eliminate its owner.

The player's arsenal is represented by a wide range of firearms typical for the chosen era - ancient flintlock pistols, classic revolvers, muskets and rifles, as well as special tools for certain types of enemies like vampires, ghouls, werewolves, swamp creatures, spirits, etc.

What scared you, being myths and scary tales, becomes reality and...attacks!

name: Nekopara Sekai Connect
description: Welcome to a new cats paradise where all kinds of nekos over the world will gather around you.

name: Psycasso
description:
Take on the role of a serial killer who creates paintings with their victims blood! Sell your creations to earn money while trying to avoid capture by the police and other civilians.

In this pixel art adventure you'll play as Psycasso, a struggling gallery artist living in an open world city. By day you'll work a day job to earn money and level up skills, seamlessly blending into society. By night you'll be on the lookout to harvest 'red paint' from one of the 'walking meat-bags' to help you create original 2D art. Sell your artwork to art galleries for huge profits! Become rich from your unique artwork while avoiding capture from the ever growing police presence using stealth techniques and unique traps. Buy property, upgrades, furniture, weapons, discover a bustling city and play a host of mini games in this controversial indie title like nothing before.

name: ShotFightDisaster
description: ShotFightDisaster (SFD) presents its tactical, team-based and action-packed gameplay. Players are catapulted into a conflict from which only the best return.

name: Project Faith
description: You are cast in the role of a young boy who starts his adventure on a mysterious and vast green landscape. You know that your destination is straight ahead. You know what that destination is. But not much else...

name: AfterTheDawn
description: After The Dawn is a scifi Survival RPG with offline and online features, it will feature co-op and pvp in online.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Part 2
description: Sin descripción

name: The Pet Squad
description:
The Pet Squad is a 2D strategy and puzzle game with pixel art aesthetics, mainly inspired by Lemmings, that puts you in the role of a support operator.

The game is set in the not-too-distant future, where humans have managed to artificially evolve animals. The pet squad S.L.U. is an organization responsible for maintaining order between humans and the evolved animals, known as Animanos.

As an operator, you will have to support your squad at all times, guide them along the correct path, and protect them from enemies or themselves. To achieve this, you will have access to the most advanced technology, allowing you to teleport objects and even slow down time.

name: Kijutsu Rider
description: Kijutsu Rider is a fast paced third person hack and slash anime styled action game where you play as one of five unstoppable heroes, carve your way through waves of monstrous enemies, take down the black cross conglomerate and save the world.

name: There's Always a Madman: The MacGuffin
description:
Secret agent Franklin Benjamin's former-mentor-turned-rogue-agent Dustin MacGuffin has resurfaced to kidnap the one you care about most.

In this single-player interactive spy novel, play as secret agent Franklin Benjamin and use your particular set of skills to save Virginia from the clutches of the madman Dustin MacGuffin.

Which means - you’d better get the MacGuffin!

name: Exil
description: A Mystical Anime-Inspired Metroidvania. Embark on an adventure through a mystical world full of magical creatures.

name: Codex: Eternal Eclipse
description: Embark on a quirky adventure with four unique main characters as they seek their truth, battling gods, colossal corporations, and bizarre foes along the way. Unravel the mystery of the Eternal Eclipse and uncover the ancient secrets of the world!

name: Prisma
description: This is the story of Alma, a girl that receives strange powers from an old Camera containing a magical Prism Shard, and is transported to another world alongside other Almas from different universes. Each Alma will have their own Prism Shard, and a unique vision of the world, some will be friends, other enemies and some NPCs.Bring together a party of Almas, open new quests and combos by bonding with them, and unlock different routes to prevent the reality to break.

name: Witches Tavern
description: Witch Tavern is a simulated business game that integrates tavern management, cosplay, love development and other elements. As the new boss of the witch tavern, you will meet all kinds of friends in this magical city of Venesia and start a full and extraordinary life.

name: The Backworld
description: Experience a non-linear turn-based horror RPG. Navigate through eerie corridors and surreal dimensions, while battling and evading terrifying monsters. Grow stronger by exploring every corner, not grinding battles. Forge your own path to find new colorful worlds, and decide the fate of the universe.

name: Nak
description: Become a ghost to save your family from ghosts. Nak is a story driven platformer with arena combat. Enter the world of Nak. Here your reflexes and analysis will be tested as you traverse vast physical and spiritual realms and square off against traditional Thai ghosts. How long will it be until you can no longer distinguish yourself from the monsters you face?

name: Loop: New Reality
description: A VR game play tester finds herself locked in a NEW REALITY! Slip on the revolutionary NEW REALITY headset and dive into the mesmerizing purple void. But beware—The Warden prowls relentlessly, hunting for its next prey.

name: Kings & Savages
description: A skill based auto battler. Easy to learn, hard to master. Little time commitment as games last a minute. Inspired by Chess and Dota.

name: Axyn Adventure
description: Axyn Adventure is a retro style 3D platformer. You take control of the titular character Axyn and embark on many adventures with your friends Yunn and Leaf. Play in the vast open levels using your big set of moves to get around. Collect as many items as you can to advance the story and unlock tons of content.

name: Lunar New Year
description: Apart from the Year "is a shooting adventure 2D horizontal version of the game developed by Emu Shanhai Studio. The game takes the legend of the zodiac as the background, integrates traditional Chinese cultural elements, and strives to let players experience a strong Chinese cultural atmosphere .

name: Margaritari
description: "Margaritari", a JRPG-style narrative game. Consisting of 9 chapters, the story begins with the encounter of two 17-year-old girls. Help the protagonist discover the secret of humanity and love, and that will be the redemption for both herself and her love.

name: Cosmi: Forbidden Forests
description: A celebration of pioneering 1980s games, this new-and-old collection of classic C64 games originally published by Cosmi includes a special remaster of Forbidden Forest with all new graphics and audio, new comic book stories and remade box art, plus a trove of archival bonus material!

name: Gorn 2
description: GORN 2 is a ludicrous sequel to the hit VR gladiator simulator from Free Lives. It's bigger, wilder, and stronger than ever before, with mighty new weapons to wield, treacherous new traps to avoid, and new power-ups to imbue you with supernatural strength. Enjoy GORN 2's improved VR combat as you battle the five sons of the God of the Afterlife across an array of heavenly realms, with in-your-face combat so irresponsibly violent you'll check your headset for blood spatters when you're done.

name: Exit Together
description: Exit Together is a 1-6 player co-op or single-player anomaly loop adventure game. Find anomalies, solve puzzles, and avoid traps. Set in a retro 1960s office atmosphere, observe your surroundings carefully to reach the next room. Will you reach Room 9 and exit, or remain trapped forever in the loop?

name: Stealth Strike
description: Gather together with up to 3 friends and sneak into banks and shops to rob them. Avoid guards and cameras to steal some valuables. But be careful - once the cops show up it's over!

name: Inkwellers
description: Online 2 player co-op puzzle adventure game, you and your friend become the Inkwellers! Dwellers of stories who venture into journals to uncover their true meaning. With your friend, you'll explore hidden worlds, solve tricky puzzles, and uncover secrets.

name: Nuclear Tides
description: Sin descripción

name: Regista
description: Be the owner of your football club, make strategic choices, and climb through the amateur league to the first while making hard decisions.

name: Snowy Memories
description: Sin descripción

name: Cozy Organizer
description: Organize, decorate, align, and stack items in cozy environments.

name: Color Factory
description: Sin descripción

name: Death Remains
description: Enter Death Remains: an open-world, permadeath survival. Scavenge, build, and barter or battle factions across a harsh sandbox. Master ruthless RPG skills, but remember—when you die, Death Remains.

name: Axom: Conquest
description: A base building roguelite tower defence game set on the dangerous planet named Axom. Gather resources to build defences, unlock research between games to get stronger and ultimately unlock the secrets of the mysterious planet.

name: QuantumPulse 2A
description: Sin descripción

name: Break Siege

name: Detective: Rainy Night
description: Detective Rainy Night is a narrative adventure with elements of deduction. Violent crimes, mature stories, and a touch of psychological horror await you at the Motel Holiday. Grab a pencil and paper because solving this case won’t be easy.

name: Animal Spa
description: Sin descripción

name: A Week in the Life of Asocial Giraffe
description: “A Week in the Life of Asocial Giraffe” is a point-and-click stealth game where the goal is to make sure nobody talks to you so that your head does not explode. You'll get to experience an average week of Giraffe's life as he does exciting things on his to-do list, such as going to the laundromat, peruses antique stores, purchasing groceries, and working out at the gym, all while making sure the incredibly sociable citizens of Friendly City never have a chance to speak with him for fear of losing your head.

name: Edge of Memories
description: The Corrosion, a plague of unparalleled proportions, has already ravaged the Astryan continent. On the other side of the world, the continent of Avaris and its nomadic peoples—so far spared from the horrors spawned by this abomination—now stand on the brink of extinction. Eline, an itinerant Soul Whisperer, relentlessly battles the force that turns the once-thriving fauna, flora and humans of this lush land into grotesque abominations. Following a mysterious encounter, a dark power awakens within her, one that may hold the key to ending this apocalypse: the ability to control the Corrosion within her own body.

name: Creepy Redneck Dinosaur Mansion 3
description: MATCH DNA BUBBLES IN AN UNDERGROUND LAB TO KEEP YOUR PSYCHIC CLONE FROM INVADING YOUR MIND AND TURNING YOU INTO A CANNIBAL. This is the match-3 survival horror comedy RPG metroidvania you didn't know you needed.

name: Warborne: Above Ashes
description: Fierce flames of war are now raging. We roam, fight, and defeat all who stand in the way of our ambitions. Join a faction in the sci-fi post apocalyptic-style multiplayer PvP war game Warborne Above Ashes, and fight for honor!

name: RockBeasts
description: Lead a band of misfits on a roller-coaster ride to stardom in the age of MTV, rock anthems, and bad haircuts. ROCKBEASTS is a story-driven, role-playing management game that puts you in the shoes of a manager of an up-and-coming rock band. Your job – take them to the top.

name: The Lonesome Guild
description: In a world consumed by loneliness, only friendship can save the day. Lead a quirky cast in this colorful single-player ARPG full of heart, battles, and bonds that change everything.

name: Intermundia: Dungeons, Polygons & Magic
description: Intermundia: Dungeons, Polygons & Magic is an RPG with a deep turn-based combat system and a story filled with multiple choices and endings. Let yourself be carried away by this epic adventure: plan your moves, choose your destiny and be prepared to face the consequences!

description: Last Drop is a story you need to experience. Welcome to Nykylä Finland 1994. Seppo Sahtivaara and friends are waiting for you. This is an openworld action game with a story that has an impact. We bring back old good games and action from the best movies from that era. We want you to enjoy!

name: Her Love, Like Poison
description: A dark lesbian horror/romance story so toxic it's emitting spores. Ethel, a shy university student, ventures into the wintry woods late one night, where she meets an enchanting raven-haired femme fatale - but all is not as it seems.

name: Voidface
description: Face off in a challenging bullet-hell arena shooter to try and clear bite-sized boss rush challenges. Learn to dodge their attacks, cast spells to gain an upper hand, and kill everything that gets in your way.

name: Velhodium Isle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Stare

name: Detective Frizbee
description: Welcome to "Detective Frizbee". It’s an open-world RPG with a detective twist. In this game, you play as Frizbee, a cuddly, silly yet clever puppy. You’ll follow the storyline and help Frizbee solve puzzles to deduce who the culprit could be.

name: Castillon
description:
Defend your Kingdom

As a renoun wizard you lay claim to a new land and build your castle! But beware, for demon invaders roam the wilds. Grow your kingdom during the day then fight off waves of enemies at night!

Castillon is a bite sized strategy game about building and defending your growing castle realm.

name: Tower Deckfense
description: Tower Deckfense is an exciting blend of tower defense and deck building. Build your deck strategically, upgrade your towers, and equip them with powerful modifiers to discover the best combinations and devastate your enemies.

name: Bonville Bandit
description: Sin descripción

name: Drift Survivor 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Curation
description: Build, customise, and expand your dream museum into a place of science and history, wonder and mystery.

name: Yokai Landlord: Monster Mystery!
description: Sin descripción

name: Dice Trek
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon Warfare III
description: Forge invincible defenses with lethal traps and devious machines, and crush relentless waves of adventurers in the ultimate tower defense showdown!

name: Roots Devour
description:
Ascend as an unnamable God, “The Root”, and unlock powerful eldritch abilities by opening card packs brimming with strange energy.

Hunt down mighty creatures and strategically acquire organ cards to build a thriving blood supply network. Obtain godlike powers and carve an eternal legacy into the chronicles of mortal history.

name: Reaper Rules
description: Sin descripción

name: Neon Hearts City
description: Sin descripción

name: Vice: Magic City Mayhem
description: Sin descripción

name: Ink Reverie
description: Sin descripción

name: Bathhouse Creatures
description: Ready, set, bath! Build and manage your bathhouse for animals in this casual and cozy management game. Keep your bathtubs clean and filled, serve a cast of whimsical creatures, decorate your bathhouse with your hard-earned cash, and be the best bathhouse there can be!

name: Dreams of Another
description: Dreams of Another is a third-person exploration-action game built around the philosophical theme, “No Creation Without Destruction.” Rather than destroying objects by shooting—as in traditional shooting games—here, your shots materialize and create the world. This unconventional mechanic offers a gameplay experience that challenges the norms of the genre and invites players into a whole new dimension.

name: Lies of P: Overture
description: Lies of P: Overture is a dramatic prequel to the acclaimed soulslike action RPG, Lies of P. It transports you to the city of Krat in its final days of haunting, late-19th-century Belle Époque beauty. On the brink of the Puppet Frenzy massacre, you follow a legendary Stalker—a mysterious guide—through untold stories and chilling secrets. As Geppetto’s deadly puppet, you’ll journey through Krat and its surroundings, uncover hidden backstories, and face epic battles that shape the past and future of Lies of P.

name: Darwin's Paradox
description: Dive into the adventure with Darwin, an octopus as endearing as he is ingenious, torn from the ocean and trapped in a vast and mysterious industrial complex. Harness his unique talents and abilities to help him overcome the many dangers and traps in this captivating platformer and adventure game.

name: Zoominoes
description: Zoominoes is a tile based roguelite deckbuilder. Collect cute animals scoring points with crazy combos as you create the perfect zoo.

name: Digimon Story: Time Stranger
description: The latest in the Digimon Story series is finally here! In this RPG, unravel a mystery that spans across the human world and the Digital World, collecting and raising a wide variety of Digimon to save the world.

name: Trainatic
description: Trainatic is an explosive incremental train-building game! Upgrade your cars, gather resources, and unlock powerful synergies to chug further down the track.

name: The Lost Sanatorium
description: You are a famous researcher, and you found out that in a very popular sanatorium that thousands of people visit, an accident happened where nobody knows what really happened. Many people say that it was a fire or something. The sanatorium has been abandoned for almost a year, but you want to find out what actually happened. So you go to the mountains and try to find out. Finally, you reach the sanatorium, which is very far from any communication/internet. You experience a lot in your visit, but then suddenly...

name: Replicube
description: Replicube is an open-ended programming puzzle game/toy about writing code to replicate 3D voxel-based objects. Solve puzzles, pursue leaderboard glory, or just make art to share with the in-game community.

name: Benny Bash
description: Survive this horror/puzzle adventure. Uncover the secrets of a cursed video game from the '80s while a malevolent entity hunts you. Solve escape room-style puzzles, navigate eerie labyrinths, and see how your actions in the game shape the real world. Stay sharp... and stay alive.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: VR
description:
The award-winning Civilization strategy series comes to virtual and mixed reality for the first time in franchise history. Experience a revolutionary new chapter from Firaxis Games with Sid Meier's Civilization VII - VR, only on Meta Quest 3 and 3S. Take your place at the Command Table and immerse yourself as you build an empire to stand the test of time.
Chart a course for your people, engage with other leaders, research technological breakthroughs, and conquer or cooperate with rival civilizations as you explore the far reaches of the unknown world.

name: Croak Crusader: The Champion of Canada
description: Do you dare save the Land of the Maple Leaf? Croak Crusader is a fast-paced, momentum-based action platformer featuring tight controls, explosive combat, and a versatile grapple mechanic.

name: Speed Demons 2
description: Speed Demons 2 is an arcade highway racing game featuring explosive action, breakneck speeds, and very intense TRAFFIC. With a pulse-pounding soundtrack, unique side-scrolling perspectives, and TONS of varied modes, vehicles, and races, Speed Demons 2 is a thrilling blend of speed and chaos.

name: Gemporium
description: Mine, Refine and Sell Gemstones of various rarities to eagerly awaiting customers in Gemporium, a casual mining simulation management game. Keep your finances in check as you juggle a growing gem emporium while simultaneously paying off a generational debt. There's only so much time in the day!

name: Indoor Baseball
description:
The highly anticipated follow up to Indoor Kickball!

Indoor Baseball is BIGGER, better, and even more destructive!

Indoor Baseball is a 1v1 baseball game played in the rooms of your house! Play in a goofy story mode to work your way up to make the school baseball team. Play a 14 game randomly generated season mode, or quick play 1v1 in a local multiplayer match against a friend or CPU.

name: HoverGrease 2
description:
Mixing the traditional elements of a team-based game with the arcade thrill of a twin-stick shooter. A super fast-paced game, where both your reflexes and your team’s positioning play a crucial role. Play the Singleplayer Story or join the 5v5 Online Multiplayer.

Dive into the vibrant, bio-cyberpunk world of Diamond Core Metropolis, where chaos reigns in every arena. Take control of a powerful mutant, master unique abilities, and fight for survival in an electrifying dystopian future.

name: Night Striker Gear
description: A brand new entry to the series, NIGHT STRIKER GEAR revitalizes the sprite scaling pseudo-3D style with polished graphics. The new GEAR System gives an added depth to the gameplay without sacrificing the intuitiveness. Feeling the rush of fast-paced music, strike through the night once more!

name: Project Thea
description: A dark, strategy-survival RPG blending retro-futuristic urban fantasy with Slavic folklore. Rebuild your colony, explore the post-apocalyptic wasteland, and engage in tactical card-based combat. Immerse yourself in a story-rich adventure with branching narratives, playable solo or in 2-player co-op.

name: Baba Yaga
description: A turn-based roguelike game of strategic combat and sinister magic. Decimate the king’s loyalist forces, grow your powers, and discover the reimagined origin story of Baba Yaga, the most feared witch of Slavic folklore!

name: Saci: The Cursed Hunt
description: Step into the heart of the Amazon rainforest and uncover the secrets behind Saci: The Cursed Hunt - an upcoming survival horror game rooted in Brazilian folklore.

name: Cloudheim
description: Ragnarok shattered the world, the gods have chosen you to shape the next one. Cloudheim is a cooperative action RPG blending crafting with chaotic physics-based combat. Gather your allies, craft your weapons, and upgrade your shop in the sky to bring harmony to a broken realm.

name: Aksun
description: Aksun is an action roguelite based on Korean shamanism and the afterlife.

name: Forbidden Solitaire
description: Forbidden Solitaire is a card-slashing horror game about unearthing the contents of a cryptic 1995 CD-ROM that should have never existed. From the creators of Ancient Enemy and Home Safety Hotline.

name: Military Incremental Complex
description:
Make weapons, make money.

Start your own military industrial complex enterprise! Begin by making bullets by hand, then with machines, then acquire entire factories. Expand into making guns, tanks, planes, and even nukes. Research new products, faster and cheaper ways to make them, and better methods of making money. Enter the stock market to raise capital, buyout rival companies, or perform market manipulation. Lobby the government for fewer regulations, better contracts, and more demand for your products. Turn the entire economy into a weapons making machine, making you ludicrous amounts of money.

name: Pico Drift
description: Explore the city as your ultimate drifting arena. Dodge traffic, outsmart the cops, and challenge your friends. Experience official campaign tracks and game modes, or create your own playgrounds. This is your world - drive it your way

name: X-Mode
description: Free-to-play action packed multiplayer FPS featuring a variety of gamemodes. Perfect for quick casual games with friends.

name: Yaku Slap
description: Yaku Slap – A rogue-like card battler where you duel monsters, master Hanafuda combos, and slap down the perfect hand! Unlock new perks, and classes as you fight your way down the Flower Path to become a Yaku Master!

name: Tamashika
description:
The game is about keeping your mind at one place.

Patterns in sensate experience reinforce an illusion of continuity. The dream is a construction of the mind that perpetuates the illusion.

The cartesian prison is a hall of mirrors, a recursive labyrinth. Each a reflection of me—only patterns and processes.

The present moment is the only thing that is real—focus. Chaotic attractors are seizing your attention. Don’t push or pull at it.

You have to reduce model complexity, you must cultivate flow. The game is about keeping your mind at one place!

Concentrate… and remember… Attention is all you need.

name: SkullSP
description: SkullSP is a PVP survival video game, base building and base raiding,.

name: Zaleste
description: Shmup collaboration between Compile Heart and M2.

name: Dragon Realms
description: Be the dragon! Customise, upgrade, and dominate a vast fantasy world. Destroy castles, battle foes, gather treasure, and rule Dragon Realms!

name: Neon Spellstorm
description: Neon Spellstorm is an action roguelite where you race along a crumbling neon path as a powerful wizard, wielding limitless magic. Unleash devastating spells, stack wild synergies, and reshape a destructible, otherworldly terrain that falls away behind you!

name: Dusttrust X
description: From the developers behind the fangame Green Snas, Dusttrust X is a revitalization of the original Dusttrust AU as well as a spiritual successor to Legacy Underswap: Thanatos. You play as both Chara and Sans as you explore a broken version of the world you once knew and see how they both react to the new situation they put themselves in of their own doing.

name: The Upper Hand
description: Dive into the capitalist utopia of New Yolk and engage in the short story of Sockswald. Building up to the climactic fist-clenching bossfight against HANDROMEDA.

name: Undertale Green: The Pre-Show
description: Experience a one-shot adventure setting up the vibrant characters of Undertale Green through a drab snippet of the surface! Interact with an unorthodox battle system, make new friends, and prepare for the long road ahead.

name: Polish Simulator
description: In Polish reality, cunning and creativity matter—solve tasks in various ways, save time, and show your neighbor who's in charge. Hunt for deals, organize barbecues, and prove that a true Pole always finds a way to make life easier for themselves and harder for their neighbor.

name: Cubic Odyssey
description: Embark on a galactic journey in Cubic Odyssey, an open-world adventure where you explore vibrant planets, craft tools, build vehicles, and fight the Red Darkness. Uncover ancient mysteries, and shape a universe full of life, danger, and limitless possibilities!

name: E-Commerce Simulator 2025
description: Build your own digital retail empire and serve customers from around the globe! E-commerce Simulator 2025 offers you a comprehensive virtual trading experience where you can showcase and sell various products.

name: Escape from Duckov
description: A single-player top-down looter-shooter game. Loot, escape, build, and eventually become a mighty bird soldier. Beware! If you are knocked down, items in your inventory will be lost! But don't worry. With your infrastructure built nicely, you will rise again soon.

name: Mashina
description: A little robot digs to repair her world. Dig, build, discover and mend in a chill, stop-motion world.

name: BrebeMan
description: Save the world with breakbeats.

name: The Weeping Swan: Ten Days of the City's Fall
description: At nightfall, the sieged city falls. Yaoguai came to massacre. You are nothing but a scholar on the brink of madness, trying to survive alongside a courtesan you met years ago. Experience two intertwined storylines in this sequel to the visual novel "The Hungry Lamb".

name: Drone Sector
description: Drone Sector is a futuristic gunship game. Provide close air support by firing variety of weapons at the enemies and guide your allied troops via commands. Keep your troops alive, complete objectives, collect resources and recruit engineers. Research better weaponry for the gunship and the troops.

name: The Unexpected (But Not Entirely Surprising) Demise of Jacques du Schnozzle
description: Jacques Du Schnozzle is the worst person in the world. Thankfully though, he’s just been murdered. Do you have what it takes to catch his killer, or will the forces of evil stop you in your tracks?

name: DisplaceMen
description: Survive as a broke painter in a magic-realist coastal town. To redeem the vanished “mermaid” within a 7-day mystery story with multiple endings, you will gradually reveal the truth of people by making paintings…with weird-ass found objects.

name: Far From The Darkness
description: A first-person multiplayer game inspired by the Werewolf concept. Depending on your role, investigate and hunt werewolves or betray your squad. Strategize, collaborate, and survive while communicating through proximity chat!

name: Build The Sun
description: Explore, Settle and Expand in this god game of tiny proportions!

name: Dino Ramen Express
description: From RAMEN to RIFLES! This is an immersive first-person simulation game where players can run their own restaurant empire. The game allows players to devise their own business strategies, from hands-on "guns & blazing" food delivery in the open world to staff management at stores.

name: Dice With Death
description: Dice With Death is a Dicebuilding Roguelike – Unfortunately you have already died. Fortunately, Death is up for some friendly competition. Collect new dice and their paired relics, create damage stacking combos, and even cheat Death himself to emerge victorious.

name: Crescent Overload
description: An Action 3D Platformer set inside a virtual cyberscape. Control AL.exe and mend a corrupted program as you traverse drives with her unique Gear Scythe.

name: Conjurers
description: Card + Tactics game based on a complete Zodiac of creature combinations!

name: All Will Fall
description: A post-apocalyptic city builder where every structure can collapse. Master a unique physics-based 3D construction system, create a sprawling vertical settlement on water, scavenge for resources, explore the ocean, and ensure your colony's survival by making difficult yet necessary decisions.

name: Terminal One
description: Airport building and light business tycoon game. Build up an airport providing cargo, maintenance, and passenger service. Choose which upgrades to invest in, manage policies, organize finances, optimize layouts, and balance carbon emissions.

name: Perplex
description: A neon-themed 2D puzzle platformer where you navigate intricate levels, solve physics-based challenges, and avoid obstacles to reach the portal. Play solo or with a friend in a visually stunning retro-futuristic world that tests your precision and strategic thinking.

name: Palpus X: Annihilation
description: An isometric brutal horde shooter with light RPG elements. Kill tons of aliens, find over a dozen weapons, skill up your character & unveil the secrets of an abandoned research lab!

name: Null Path
description: Your skill, patience, and ingenuity will be tested in this homage to precision platformers and metroidvanias! Traverse various biomes, from caves to volcanic wastelands and mysterious towers. Each environment with it's own deadly traps, puzzles, and challenges designed to push you to your limits.

name: Dataclysm
description: Embark on a journey into the heart of a digital kingdom unlike any other. Dataclysm invites you to explore a world where ancient data comes alive, and every line of code tells a story waiting to be unraveled.

name: Re:Ver Project - Tokyo
description: Co-developed by Toei Animation and indie developer Nestopi, is a survival suspense adventure game set in modern Tokyo depicted in pixel art. Yukinori Amane whos falsely accused of a crime, uses his survival skills to evade the police and uncover the real culprit.

name: The Sisterhood Mansion
description: The Sisterhood Mansion is a light fantasy adventure game with pixel art that combines life simulation and management elements, inspired by the cultures of China’s southwestern ethnic minorities.

name: Net Raiders
description: Net Raiders is a single-player game that combines RPG, deck-building, and roguelike elements. In order to survive the dangers of the ruined virtual world, you must synthesize the cards in your hand to find the best move and defeat the enemies you encounter!

name: Cantaloupe Chronicle
description:
You've arrived in the cozy roadside town of Cantaloupe to begin your internship at your aunt's newspaper. Here, you'll not only learn how to craft compelling articles but also uncover the big mystery hidden in the town's past.

Explore Cantaloupe by collecting items, engaging with locals, and solving puzzles to uncover a series of smaller stories to write about. Keep your eyes peeled for clues related to the big mystery—the key to your final, front-page article.

The game offers a variety of topics for you to explore and write about using a custom text editor. Don't worry, you don't have to write all the text yourself—you'll find clues that unlock text blocks, which you can easily insert into your articles with a simple click. Your ultimate goal is to piece together the story behind a mysterious body found years ago and uncover the truth.

Discover the charming locations in and around Cantaloupe, filled with atmosphere and intriguing characters to meet. Immerse yourself in this laid-back experience and soak in the soothing ambiance of a small, roadside town.

name: Cabbie!
description: Cabbie! is an epic co-op driving adventure for one to four players. Boost, drift and jump your way around town to deliver people and packages in a race against the clock. Unlock new characters, levels and cosmetics as you journey across worlds!

name: Arsenic & Absinthe
description: Arsenic & Absinthe is a blend of a chill bartender simulation with narrative-driven story. The player takes on the role of "Sylene", a bartender who recently began a new life; making drinks, serving unusual recipes of art, and listening to the stories of working-class customers. A simple life, however, is merely a dream for her as her haunted past returns. The player has to explore the night city and solve the pre-midlife crisis while getting caught in the notorious "Snow White" murder case once more.

name: Comme Tu Veux
description: Comme Tu Veux is a visual novel set in 1966 Saigon, focused on two 14-year-old school girls, Hồng and Như Ý, whose friendship falls apart. They meet again at an antiques market where Như Ý outbuys Hồng for a vase. Như Ý disappears, and Hồng's brother is found murdered.

name: Blackblade Revenant
description: Blackblade Revenant is a Sekiro-like action RPG with parry-focused combat set during the fall of an ancient dynasty. Rise from the dead as Revenants and return to the mortal realm with one mission: Kill the King who cheated death.

name: The Gambit Lost to Time
description: Become a time-travelling advisor seeking to shape this world towards her ideal future. Choose between one of four kingdoms to support, with the realization that today's friend is an enemy in another timeline. Bring out your best Gambits and lead your troops to victory!

name: Zoomageddon
description: Play as Oyen, an orange cat, in a post-apocalyptic world where you collect Zodiac Beasts abilities and challenge the Rat King. Zoomageddon blends bullet-heaven, dungeon roguelike, and base-building mechanics. Uncover story-rich inspired by Chinese Zodiac, unlock building, and discover quirky power!

name: Recettear: An Item Shop's Tale HD Edition
description: A remaster of Recettear to be released in 2025.

name: Mystereet: Yasogami Kaoru no Chousen!
description: An upcoming remastered version of Mystereet: Yasogami Kaoru no Chousen! made by MAGES. for Windows, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Xbox Series X/S.

name: Just A Shadow Game
description: Hear me, pitiful mortals, for I shall reveal to you the path to true power - a demonic fusion of deckbuilding, ritual duels, and roguelite! I speak of a realm shrouded in darkness, where only the most wicked may thrive. Behold my masterpiece, "Just A Shadow Game".

name: Catfall
description: A lone astronaut cat survives a spaceship crash and now embarks on a journey to find the crew: his feline friends and his dearest human.

name: Shore of Jord
description: Shore of Jord is a story-driven cRPG set in an alternate world of Europa, where you take on the role of a retired military officer trying to resolve mysterious events from your past and survive the longest winter in history: strengthen or break friendships, find your love, and discover who you are.

name: Elflock
description: Elflock is a single-player third-person adventure. You are a princess returning to your home on the brink of war and it's up to you to navigate the machinations of the nobles surrounding the king. Engage in intricate dialogues and uncover mysteries in this branching fantasy tale!

name: Bat Galaxy
description: Half on-rails shooter, half exploration-driven adventure. Zoom into a world where billions of bullets surround you and your handy punch feature can send enemies flying.

name: Ninja Ming
description: Embark on a thrilling 2D platforming adventure as Ninja Ming, a master of teleportation in this precision-based game. Navigate the challenging Path of Transcendence, where your teleportation skills are key to conquering obstacles and reaching new heights. As you progress through the Forest, Wind, Mountain, and Fire trials, each step is a chance to refine your skills and become even more formidable. Use your teleportation abilities to maneuver with speed and style, overcoming each new challenge that comes your way. The harder the trials, the greater your growth.

name: Perennial Dusk: Kinsenka
description:
Industry veteran Yukito Urushibara and prolific illustrator Saine join forces for the first time to craft a stunning tale about a group of young people in an eerie world of endless twilight. Follow their story as they struggle against limitless cruelty and confront the inescapable traumas of life and death together.

Perennial Dusk: Kinsenka is the latest visual novel written by Yukito Urushibara, whose work on Irotoridori no Sekai and Sakura Moyu captivated players with stories that inspire hope as readily as they induce despair.

name: Off
description: “I’m the Batter. I’ve been entrusted with a sacred mission.” -- One of the most influential RPGs of the last 20 years is finally coming to Steam and Nintendo Switch. Take control of the Batter as he seeks to purify an uncanny and hopeless world haunted by specters, guided by a cryptic, grinning cat called The Judge.

name: Ys vs. Trails in the Sky: Alternative Saga
description:
Finally, the walls between Falcom's legendary RPG series, Ys and Trails, are broken for the ultimate dream match up! Fan-favorite heroes and rivals clash in battles once thought impossible, with support from beloved characters across Falcom's classic titles to aid you in the fight!

This new version of the PSP title features remastered graphics, online multiplayer, English translation and voice acting, and other new features.

name: Syntaxia
description: SYNTAXIA is a dream-dark adventure game that allows you to rewrite reality itself by changing the words that describe it. Use your creativity and intuition to escape. Which path will you choose?

name: Bank Simulator
description: Bank Simulator puts you in charge of a dynamic bank, from developing sections and overseeing transactions to making strategic investments. Build customer loyalty, expand services, and manage financial risks to grow your bank into a top financial institution where every decision counts!

name: GameStonk Simulator
description: Order games, stock up on consoles, collect shiny retros, roll for discounts and bonuses, strategize upgrades, and hunt thieves.*Disclaimer: contains parodies of game titles that will crack you up!

name: Maize
description: Welcome to the Warren Family Haunted Halloween Corn Maze! Collect all of the harvest items to fill your cornucopia and unlock the exit of the maze! Have fun, and watch out for the scarecrows! Ha-ha! Just kidding! Our maze is completely safe and family friendly - we promise!

name: Planeturem
description: Explore a procedurally generated planet filled with resources to harvest - or discover structures containing potentially rare items. Build your base to protect yourself and fight off evil, collecting materials to build new gear. Build a rocket and explore new planets!

name: Unearther
description: Journey into different places and environments in search of resources and valuables. Make tools and equipments, survive the dangers and lurking monsters. Craft your way of living and discover the unknown world hidden in plain sight.

name: Moony: Black_Lotus
description: In a world of corrupted memories, you traverse the remains of a once flourishing city. Shadows flicker around you and metallic echoes pulse through your mind. Search for your father's legacy to regain your forgotten past. But beware! Each step takes you deeper into a waking nightmare.

name: Imperium
description: A medieval fantasy, round-based horde mode FPS. Become a Paladin solo or with up to 3 friends, wield swords and spells to purge an endless onslaught of reanimated horrors. Perform rituals, unlock spells and melee weapons, and uncover the truth behind the enchanted fortress you are sworn to protect.

name: Agatha Christie: Death on the Nile
description: Death on the Nile is an adventure-detective game, offering a fresh twist on Agatha Christie’s famous story. Set in the lively 1970s, play as Hercule Poirot and detective Jane Royce as they solve two connected mysteries. Dive into a journey filled with intrigue, deception, and unexpected revelations.

name: Bendy: Lone Wolf
description: Bendy: Lone Wolf will tests your ability to survive against ever increasing odds. Monsters and obstacles emerge from every direction as you journey into the rubberhose halls of the world's most evil animation studio. Every day is a challenge.

name: Terminull Brigade
description: Rise in the virtual rebellion to free the Nullverse in this action-packed roguelike game together with other players, or alone. Master your Rogueteers with distinct playstyles and customizable builds and break out from the binaric destiny with the Terminull Brigade.

name: Merlin's Chess
description: Merlin's Chess is a fantasy-themed VR chess game brings a completely new gameplay experience to the greatest strategy game ever. Explore an immersive and enchanting way to play chess.

name: Already Dead
description: Classic 90's style survival horror, reimagined for VR.

name: BlackGate
description: In this asymmetrical multiplayer experience, every player has a unique role to play, with one ultimate goal: survival. Up to 4 Engineers are pit against an alien specimen controlled by a 5th player.

name: Trials of Yarbil
description: In this top-down roguelike you must think creatively to take advantage of your resources and best your enemies. You are a samurai wizard and to prove your worth you must complete the Trials of Yarbil.

name: Spleezy Park
description: Spleezy Park is an horror parkour-themed game where you enter in a park to search for your little brother, but you didn't knew what you would need to kill to get to him.

name: Birchwood
description:
Birchwood is a narrative driven psychological horror game which delves into the dark-side of 1980’s Britain.
After an ecological and personal tragedy befell your household a decade earlier, you must now return home and uncover the morbid secrets which lay at the heart of the once idyllic farmhouse, while confronting the evil which destroyed your family.
Armed with nothing but a VHS camcorder, it’s up to you to solve the mystery of what really happened on that fateful night ten years ago.

name: Deprision
description: Deprision is a psychological horror game that delivers an immersive and terrifying AAA experience. Survive human madness, amnesia's power, and navigate parallel worlds via a deadly virus. Solve your world's problem, survive, prevent more deaths, and escape before it's too late.

name: Desktop Survivors 98
description: Desktop Survivors 98 is a chaotic roguelite dungeon crawler that unfolds right on your Desktop. Take control of your cursor as you explore new rooms, battle relentless waves of enemies, and collect powerful new weapons.

name: Hashire Hebereke: EX
description: Hashire Hebereke: EX is a modern remake of the 1994-released Super Famicom racing action game Hashire Hebereke by SUNSOFT. Players can choose from comical and cute characters like series protagonist Hebe and partake in extreme races across unique stages. While carrying over elements from the original game, it will add a new Time Attack mode, new characters, and new stages, as well as four-person online multiplayer support.

name: Dispatch
description: Dispatch is a superhero workplace comedy where choices matter. Manage a dysfunctional team of misfit heroes and strategize who to send to emergencies around the city, all while balancing office politics, personal relationships, and your own quest to become a hero.

name: Game of Thrones: Kingsroad
description:
Enter the world of the HBO hit series, Game of Thrones.
Experience an open-world action RPG with an original story found only in Game of Thrones: Kingsroad!

name: Stalcraft: X - Operations
description: Sin descripción

name: Steel Paws
description: Embark on a dynamic action adventure game as a girl alongside her buddy robots to conquer a mysterious tower that reappears every century.

name: Shadow Labyrinth
description: Shadow Labyrinth is a 2D action platformer and a genre-twisting alternate take on the iconic PAC-MAN. As The Swordsman, you wake on a mysterious planet amidst relics of wars past. To survive you will discover secrets, consume your enemies, and grow from prey to apex predator.

name: Dave the Diver: In the Jungle
description: Dave the Diver: In the Jungle is a DLC expansion for Dave the Diver. It introduces a new jungle-themed environment where players can explore for exotic resources and face additional challenges, all while continuing to balance underwater exploration with restaurant management.

name: One Move Away
description: One Move Away is a cozy, first-person puzzle game where you pack your belongings for another move and embark on a new chapter in life. With each move, you step into the lives of three unique characters, uncovering their personal stories through the items they take with them—or leave behind.

name: Nekomancer of Nowhere
description: Draw spells on your screen as the Nekomancer! Swap between the realms of life and death, revive ghosts, and uncover Tombstone Tower's haunting truth!

name: The Vast White
description: Explore an old mountain at your pace in this openworld snowboarding adventure. Uncover hidden paths, experience dynamic weather, and explore stunning landscapes as you ride. Every path holds new secrets.

name: Hardcore Circus
description: Hardcore Circus is an intense action-platformer where you play as Dik, a skilled acrobat on a daring quest to rescue his brother Alex from the grasp of the Devil. Face devilish traps and brutal challenges that will push your acrobatic abilities to the limit.

name: Snake in the Dark
description: Sure, you've played Snake. But could you play it blind? Snake in the Dark is a total re-imagination of the timeless arcade and puzzle game classics like Snake and Sokoban. Fun gameplay you know delivered with more puzzling twisssts than you expect!

name: Incrate
description: Incrate is a mind-warping 2D/3D puzzle game within a crate! Bend reality and manipulate your perspective to solve the puzzles and escape!

name: Scourge of the Reptiles
description: Scourge of the Reptiles is a party-based tactical RPG set in a prehistoric fantasy world. When a meteor strikes the Earth, humans, elves and dinosaurs alike are gifted with magical abilities—abilities that result in war, devastation and forces that stretch far beyond the hero’s quiet home village.

name: StarSim: BattleZone
description: StarSim: BattleZone is a real-time strategy (RTS) game set in the StarSim universe. Take command of an army and lead your faction to victory. Gameplay includes classic RTS mechanics such as: building a base, gathering resources, researching new technologies, building defences, training units, etc.

name: Steel Century Groove
description: Pilot mecha in rhythm-RPG dance battles. Assemble a squad of colossal dancers, challenge every rival you lock eyes with, compete for the championship trophy, and uncover the secrets of a world where everything moves to the drumbeat of steel feet.

name: Bashful Adoration
description: Fight for your love with 2-4 friends locally or online in easy-to-learn, hard-to-master combat. Soar the skies on your broom, and dash and smash props and opponents until they're a twinkling dot on the horizon! Secure powerups, land devastating blows, and win the adoration of your crush!

name: RPG Chess
description: A turn-based RPG, except it's also chess! Instead of capturing, your pieces engage in thrilling 1v1 battles where they can level up and unlock powerful abilities. Shape your team as you progress through the single-player campaign or challenge others in online matches!

name: Flexible Frosty
description: A short and icy GameBoy-style puzzle platformer featuring Frosty, a cute little penguin who can not jump like other penguins.

name: Pastopia
description: Become a Memory Walker in Pastopia and restore the mystical lands of Talmanu. In this open-world adventure, team up with your Golem A.I companion to explore vast environments, solve puzzles, and unleash your creativity. Discover the lost memories of Pastopia and shape your own adventure!

name: Spirit of the Obelisk
description: Switch between four unique heroes, each with their own special ability in this charming puzzle platformer. Play alone or with a friend to complete interesting puzzles in vibrant themed worlds.

name: Class of Heroes 3: Remaster
description: The classic, school-based 3D dungeon-crawling RPG is back! After a 15-year wait, the third installment in the series comes to the West, with new features, more characters, classes, and bigger dungeons.

name: Ultimate Sheep Raccoon
description: Ultimate Sheep Raccoon is a bike-racing party game where you and your friends build the course together. Add obstacles and dangerous traps, take the lead with power-ups, and race to the finish!

name: Faraway
description: Sin descripción

name: Gemwielders
description: In this competitive deckbuilding game you are a Gemwielder, capable of controlling an ancient artifact weapon. Socket mystical gems to acquire powerful abilities and prevail in a duel against another Gemwielder.

name: Knock Off: The Battle for Imagination
description: Sin descripción

name: Cosmorons
description: A mix of gravity-defying gameplay, slapstick-tinged parody, and a classic low-poly-inspired aesthetic all wrapped up in an addictive arcade shooter for 1-4 players!

name: AM Archaic Memories
description: It's a 3D platform about the dreams and nightmares of a 90-year-old being.

name: Dark Dawn: The Chronicles of a Doll
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinbleton Park
