description: Pinbleton Park is a small open world cosy adventure game where the whole world can transform into a giant pinball table. Help the villagers, rescue lost spirits, craft new pinball elements, and take down the corporation bent on destroying the forest!

name: Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping
description: When spookiness strikes a luxury campsite, the one and only Duck Detective is summoned to quack the case. Inspect evidence, make de-duck-tions, and solve this no-murder mystery!

name: Piece by Piece
description: It's time to open shop! Inherit your family's repair shop, and roll up your sleeves. Fix up the prized possessions of the forest folk, paint yourself a masterpiece to sell and make your family shop all your own with decorations, furniture and cookies!

name: The Little Tomb: The Maholova Club and the Search for a Dead Body
description: "Is there a dead body who'd like to be buried in me?" This is a coming-of-age adventure of a young boy who believes he's an ancient tomb! As Kofun, interact with all sorts of characters and objects. Gain points and spend them on new skills and hints to show Kofun a world of new experiences!

name: Muri: Wildworlds
description: Explore the mysterious creature-filled Wildwoods as a Muri. Find secrets, solve puzzles, befriend creatures, and clean away the corruption. Restore the world's beauty in this cozy adventure!

name: Virtual Cottage 2
description: Virtual Cottage 2 motivates and supports you in tackling your daily tasks. Use its built-in productivity tool to accomplish your goals faster. Create your ultimate cozy space with a wide range of different furniture.

name: Yellow Trouble
description: 8-way water gun blasting horizontal 2D arcade co-op shoot ‘em up, with ducks?!

name: Nice Day for Fishing
description: The world needs you Adventurer! Embark on an RPG pixel adventure where you’ll play as Baelin the humble fisherman, who must rise-up to become the hero of Honeywood. Battle fish with precision timing and magic spells, upgrade your abilities, defeat evil and rebuild Honeywood.

name: Rusty Road Racing
description: A fun rally simulator focusing on car physics modeling, tire skidding, and suspension functionality! Full camera customization, recording, and sharing features! Incredible turns and jumps await drivers who are crazy enough!

name: Dirtbag Mahjong
description:
Lie, cheat, and steal your way to victory in Dirtbag Mahjong!

Choose your character and join five other dirtbags for a night of riichi mahjong - with a twist. Nobody here plays fair, and they've all got some dirty tricks up their sleeves.

Dirtbag Mahjong is a complete and beginner-friendly mahjong experience that also offers some party game surprises to keep experienced players guessing.

name: Life of a Lonely Indie Game Developer
description: "Create the games you want, at the time you want, and live doing only what you love." In this realistic life simulation game, an independent game developer dreams of such a life, struggling with money and time while paying taxes until death. Whether this life is happy or truly lonely, you decide.

name: A Tiny Wander
description: Buu must deliver a package through a deep forest. Despite many attempts to challenge the forest, he has not succeeded. Chat with passersby, explore, and take breaks at campsites, while searching for a way to get through the forest. Let's go on a small nighttime adventure with Buu!

name: Comet Force
description: Sin descripción

name: Jelly Troops
description: An online action RTS where the tide can turn in a flash! Fight exciting battles where you recruit golems to battle your opponent’s slimes, cleverly redirect their slimes with walls, or sneakily steal their flag to make a dramatic comeback.

name: Karting of Banban
description: Grip your steering wheel and join your favorite Banban characters in the race of a lifetime! Drift around tight corners and zoom through locations both old and new. Use power-ups and boosts to dodge your opponents and claim first place!

name: Mahou Shoujo no Majo Saiban
description: When the girls wake up, they find themselves in an unfamiliar prison mansion. As the looming "Witch Trial" approaches, investigate the prison mansion and uncover the witch hidden among the girls. Expose the witch's magic and lies, and execute her.

name: Girls Made Pudding
description:
"When there's nobody there to see you, you disappear."

In Girls Made Pudding, two girls tour a series of towns that people have disappeared from. Follow them on the road as they find out the mysteries of this world.

name: Prolegomena To a Hyperdimensional Interface That Will Be Able to Manifest From Three-Minute Interchanges
description: This is a fully voiced multi-ending adventure game that progresses by repeating a limited 3-minute dialogue time. Interactions primarily occur through an interface called "choices".

name: Chop Shop
description: Feel the flow as you hunt, butcher, and cook at a blisteringly fast pace in this action shop-keeping game. Hunt adorable monsters, chop colossal carcasses, and power-slice through huge chunks of flesh to serve your customers even faster. Move fast and stay sharp if you want your shop to survive.

name: Juufuutei Raden's Guide for Pixel Museum
description: A VTuber from hololive DEV_IS, "Juufuutei Raden" from ReGLOSS, will guide you through a museum as the curator. The entire game world, including Curator Raden and the museum, is depicted in "pixel art". The illustrations are completed by solving logic nonogram puzzles.

name: Empyreal
description: Empyreal is a complex, challenging, feature-rich action RPG. In a far-flung corner of the galaxy an Expedition arrives on a hitherto unexplored planet to find a colossal Monolith built by a lost civilisation.

name: City Tales: Medieval Era
description: Build medieval cities teeming with life and tales untold. Forge organic urban landscapes and manage a rich economy whilst building bonds with companions whose stories are intertwined with the fate of your city.

name: Chains of Freedom
description: Embark on a thrilling journey in a high-stakes, turn-based tactics game. Lead an elite squad in a fictional, dystopian Eastern Europe as you unravel a sinister conspiracy threatening the nation. Navigate intense strategic battles and adapt to ever-evolving challenges to prevail.

name: Tombwater
description: Explore the accursed Wild West town of Tombwater and lay bare the eldritch horrors that lie beneath. Survive blood-spilling combat in this gruesome 2D action-RPG that might just drive you to madness.

name: SpaceCraft
description: The Universe is yours. SpaceCraft is an online space exploration and building game. Explore a vast galaxy of solar systems and planets, mine and craft resources, design and build ships, automate planetary bases and interplanetary logistics, trade and cooperate.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Tactical Takedown
description: Splinter and Shredder are dead. Help the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles tackle deadly new threats and the approach of adulthood in this fast-paced turn-based beat-em-up.

name: Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault
description: Live the double life of a fearless adventurer and a crafty merchant! Dive into vibrant dimensions brimming with shiny loot and pesky enemies. Grow your shop, tinker with weapons and gadgets, as well as make your mark among a ragtag community of castaways.

name: Scorched Warfare
description: This is a strategy action game set in a fictional fantasy world. You play as a warmaster, commanding troops in battles. Use the roguelike system to customize your gameplay style: will you be a one-man army, standing against thousands, or a mastermind tactician controlling the battlefield?

name: Deserter
description: In this stealth RPG, you play as a deserter who is forced to become a thief in a grim, war-torn town. You'll have access to a rich arsenal of tools and devices: from lock picks and crowbars to grappling hooks and dynamite. Additionally, take advantage of your surroundings: find or create alternate routes, stick to the shadows, stay quiet, or use loud noises to cause distraction.

name: Hue Hooligans
description: A puzzle-platformer where you use phone booths to switch between characters, each one with a unique ability.

name: Another Head
description: Hey, someone's at the door! There's a new neighbor in town! Live a week in Havenbrook as Tom, surrounded by mysteries, meaningful choices, and multiple endings. Forge your own path and shape your story with no predefined quests. Will you uncover the truth?

name: Idea Fix
description: Incremental physics based game about pushing levers, clicking buttons and coming to terms with obsession.

name: Light of Motiram
description: Light of Motiram is an open-world survival game where you explore a world overrun by colossal machines, explore the vast open world, build your base of operations, advance technology, train Mechanimals, and take on formidable bosses. Starting from the primitive age, forge a new path of development. Defy the machination, survive with mechanimals.

name: Shard Squad
description: In Shard Squad, join elemental creatures to save their lands in intense battles against challenging hordes and bosses. Strengthen yourself with unique allies, gather valuable items, face epic calamities, and unlock new members to create unique strategies on your path to victory!

name: Katanaut
description: Descend into cosmic madness aboard a collapsing space station in Katanaut, a fast-paced action-roguelite. Unleash powerful abilities, master fluid combat, and confront eldritch horrors as reality unravels around you. Survive relentless battles and fight for your very existence.

name: Volvy’s Adventure DX
description: Sin descripción

name: Nexus: FPV Drone Shooter
description: Nexus is a high-speed FPV roguelike shooter where you pilot combat drones through intense aerial missions. Master fluid flight mechanics while blasting through procedural missions. Customise your build, upgrade your base, and push deeper into enemy territory with each run.

name: 868-Back
description:
The Hacker was known as the best of the best, delving into dark servers no one else could penetrate and returning with glittering data to sell on the black market.

Nobody knows why they quit. Some say their will was broken by the dark secrets at the heart of the Mainframe. Some say they simply retired to a penthouse suite in Low Earth Orbit.

But when you leave the world of high-stakes cybercrime, it's hard to stay gone. With a call from an old enemy in need of help..

868-HACK is 868-BACK.

name: Kingdom Ascension
description: Step into the role of a lord, starting from scratch to build your kingdom. Gather resources, construct buildings, recruit troops, explore, and embark on adventures to continuously expand your territory and defend your homeland.

name: Beneath the Frost
description: Beneath the Frost is a short, single-player, psychological horror game set on a frozen, desolate planet. You take on the role of the sole survivor of a spacecraft crash, using a robot companion to gather parts for an SOS device while uncovering an eerie mystery that suggests they may not be alone.

name: Songs of Rats
description: The Wreckage resounds with the echoes of countless songs, filling the air of a constantly shifting maze where bravery and sacrifice are key to staying alive. Then, without warning, one song goes silent. Will you step into this dicey labyrinth and uncover its secrets in this minimalist and dark RPG?

name: The Adventures Of Captain J
description: Sin descripción

name: Blightstone
description: Blightstone is a challenging, dark fantasy turn-based roguelike that brings unique twists to combat through freedom of character placement, interactive environments and hardcore resource management. Dying, learning, and meta-progression will be key in your mission to destroy the Blightstone itself

name: Haunted by Femboy
description: In this choice-based NSFW visual novel after inheriting a strange house from your parents, you stumble upon an ancient book and accidentally summon a mischievous femboy ghost. Now bound to your home, the ghost becomes your roommate, and it's up to you to find the missing pages of the book while navigating your unusual new life together.

name: Reality Drift
description: Reality Drift is a roguelike racing game where your choices matter. Race through a series of strange worlds, choose upgrades for your car and decide which track will be next - your decisions are just as important as how you drive!

name: Neon Inferno
description: NYC 2055: a city beyond salvation. Blast your way through this dense cyberpunk jungle in NEON INFERNO, an explosive fusion of 2D run-and-gun and gallery-shooter, and help the Family dominate its streets!

name: Operatives: Revolve
description: Operative Revolve is a cinematic roguelike deckbuilder with an unique gameplay mechanic. Play as Operatives, secret agents who oversee a world governed by machine ideology. Use your Machine cards that can physically attack or block damage, to battle enemies opposing your directive and uncover the hidden truths within the machinated world.

name: Manipulus
description:
Manipulus is a thrilling deck-building, choose-your-own-adventure game with rogue-like mechanics and perma-death. Trapped by mysterious forces, you are made to relive your past, guiding a band of survivors through perilous times.

As a Manipuli general, form strategic defensive lines and manoeuvre your followers to activate wild abilities to defeat the oncoming monsters and lead your band to safety. Re-play your cards, re-live your actions, and fight to keep your refugees alive in this dark and captivating adventure.

It's time to FORM THE MANIPULUS!

name: Crystalfall
description:
Hack 'N' Slash Action RPG in a Steampunk World

Take on the role of a convict who has been thrown into the dungeons by a powerful ruling organization. Embark on a journey through a world devastated by a mysterious asteroid, scattering powerful crystal shards across distinct world zones brimming with mutated creatures and steampunk enemies.

Delve into post-apocalyptic dungeons that randomize upon each visit and ascend to new heights of power with epic loot, extensive talent tree progression, theorycrafting and lootable skills.

name: Clutchtime: Basketball Deckbuilder
description:
A basketball-themed Roguelike Deckbuilder. Each player in a basketball team is represented by 3 skill cards like 2 and 3 point shots, rebounds, steals, blocks, assists, crossover moves. There are also coaching cards like timeouts, challenge or substitution.

The cards are played during a match with a goal of outscoring your opponent. You can play an elimination tournament, or a season where you need to qualify into playoffs.

You can trade cards with other teams, duplicate, remove and upgrade them. You can draft new cards at the end of each quarter and keep one of those permanently at the end of each match.

There's a multiplayer mode as well, where you can play PvP matches when you meat during the competition.

name: Kingsguard
description: Lead your kingdom to victory! By day, you build and prepare your kingdom for impending threats. But every night, you must defend your kingdom against hordes of monsters, by commanding soldiers, building turrets, and fighting on the battleground yourself.

name: Moonsigil Atlas
description: The deckbuilding roguelike with tile-based mana. Strategically position powerful magic sigils, use tile adjacency to create overpowered combos, and seal away the Astral Titans to save the universe from calamity!

name: Active Matter
description:
You’re an operative stuck in a time loop, always brought back from the dead to the same point.

Choose your loadout and enter quantum unstable zones rich with active matter — a substance capable of warping and ripping the very fabric of space and time.

Fight against rivals from other timelines, survive physics-breaking anomalies and try to stay alive. Harvest active matter, gather loot and extract to a safe place before the whole zone ceases to exist with everything inside it.

name: World of Warcraft: Mists of Pandaria Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: Hearthstone: The Heroes of Time
description: The Heroes of Time (working title) is Hearthstone's 31st expansion, set to release as the third expansion of 2025. In this expansion, players travel with Chromie through alternate realities to recruit Legendary Warcraft heroes.

name: Hearthstone: The Shrouded City
description: The Shrouded City (working title) is Hearthstone's 30th expansion, set to release as the second expansion of 2025. This expansion is stylized as the first-ever sequel expansion, following the events of Journey to Un'Goro. Players join Elise on a hunt for a mythical, lost Tortollan city.

name: Hearthstone: Into the Emerald Dream
description: Into the Emerald Dream is Hearthstone's 29th expansion, set to release as the first expansion of 2025. This expansion explores the Emerald Dream, as the battle between the Old Gods and the Druids of the Emerald Dream decides the fate of the World Tree.

name: AquaDark
description: AquaDark is a first-person horror game with management elements set in the ‘80s. As an aquapark owner, players have to serve customers, sell wares, record everything, and solve the mystery behind strange events in the aquapark.

name: Shroud of Gloom
description: Shroud of Gloom is a point-and-click horror game. Solve puzzles, collect items and uncover secrets with nothing but a flickering flashlight to guide your way. Can you survive the dark and make it out alive?

name: Mama's Sleeping Angels
description: Kiss and decapitate your friends in a Co-Op horror game about collecting cursed objects to feed to a deity called Mama, lest she hunger for you. Work together, and betray each other... Anything to keep Mama happy.

name: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants
description: Live the adventure with the Premium Edition to receive Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants Story DLC*.

name: Angel
description: ANGEL imbues breakbeats with networked aesthetics in this rhythm/racing adventure. In a network devastated by digital climate change, what does it mean to be connected?

name: Gangstalk
description: GANGSTALK is a psychological horror game from the POV of your stalkers.

name: Maintenance Required
description: It's your job to check up on an "edutainment" game that was reported to be having some issues. Collect items, catch and battle monsters, and work through puzzles. Just be careful, though, because you never know what may be lurking around the corner.

name: 100 Hidden Capybaras
description: It is a hidden object game with hand-drawn graphics. Find one by one 100 unique capybaras in different, colorful settings while listening to calm music. Find, click, find another one, and enjoy the painted picture.

name: McBelle Manor
description: McBelle Manor is a Survival Horror game that takes you to an old, abandoned house that has been turned into the latest Halloween attraction.

name: Royal Montgomery Raceways
description:
Royal Montgomery Raceways is a vintage racing game set between the years 1913 and 1939; covering the golden age of racing across the world.
RMR is still in development.

name: Alisa: The Parting
description: Sin descripción

name: Sunset Land
description: Our story takes place on Venture, a planet that has recently been colonized by several corporations to harvest its valuable resources. You play as a psychic named Marco, who is tasked with stealing 3 stellar crystals (artifacts which contain tremendous amounts of energy) for an intergalactic mob boss.

name: Crater Song
description: Crater Song is a single-player co-op puzzle-adventure game with an authentic 8-bit aesthetic that takes place on the alien world of Orebody. Two twins, born of song, must embark on a mythic journey to lift a curse that makes them the target of eldritch horrors from beyond the stars.

name: Devils on the Moon Pinball
description: Themed on the astrologically Occult, Devils on the Moon is a Single board VG-Pinball Heavily inspired by all the great Pinball games of the past and some modern ones as well.

name: The Hundredth Hike
description: The Hundredth Hike is an Indie Psychological Horror game, living the story of you, as a mountain hiker, reliving your tragic past and finding the calm of the nature under your boots. Unaware of what lies before you, you unleash a powerful and mysterious truth.

name: Kill The Music
description: Auto-Attack to the Beat of the Music and Hit Rhythm Inputs to boost your Damage! Build up your Solo Meter to trigger beautiful animations and cascading effects to mow down hordes of enemies!

name: Astrumis: Survive Together
description: Astrumis - Survive Together is an exclusively co-op horror game. One player controls a survivor on an abandoned spaceship and the other the ship itself. They must work together to survive against the mysterious monster.

name: Pirates Outlaws 2: Heritage
description: Pirates Outlaws 2 is a roguelike deckbuilder card game. Collect and fuse cards to evolve, gather relics for outfit bonus and design your own strategy. Become reputed, loot the Sea Masters, challenge giant creatures and triumph the great Arena.

name: MindsEye
description: MindsEye is a story-driven, action-adventure thriller, set in a fictional near future Americana.

name: Steel Knight's Armis
description: "Steel Knight's ARMIS" is a roguelike robot game. Lead the rebellion through five chapters, fighting against the Imperial Army and Earth Federation. Customize and upgrade your robot to survive the intense battles ahead.

name: Vile: Director's Cut
description: A game about misogynistic entitlement. Browse an old computer's files to uncover information about adult film actress Candy Corpse, and her recent departure from the industry.

name: The Victor Initiative
description: The Victor Initiative is an atmospheric horror game about exploring an abandoned government facility that lost contact with the rest of the world 60 years ago.

name: Angst: A Tale of Survival
description: ANGST is a solo & co-op wilderness survival game set in a freezing, gritty, stylized Low-Poly limbo-like world. Craft tools and weapons, hunt, fish, and fight to stay alive. Upgrade skills to venture deeper into the wild, but be warned: what lurks there can thwart your plans. Survive the ANGST!

name: Strand
description: Step into the desolate void of a high-tech space station in STRAND. Face mind-bending puzzles to escape an infinite time loop while uncovering the fate of your crew. Every detail matters as you unravel the mystery and question humanity’s role in the vast, unforgiving universe.

name: Korter 1996
description: You find a secret passage at your new flat leading to other people’s homes. Unpack your stuff, collect items and solve the mysteries of each of the apartments to unlock the story of the apartment block. You might not feel so lonely, after all.

name: Kill All Lice
description: Play as the egocentric Captain Soepp and the sarcastic Lieutenant Xam'Pu in this wacky RFun & Gun to kill evil at its root by defeating the king of lice, Lous the First! Go solo or team up to stop the infestation spreading across Eloise's family! KILL ALL LICE is a proper soap opera adventure!

name: Tinymon
description:
Tinymon RPG is based in an isekai world that resembles Japan. The natives here speak Japanese, however thanks to higher powers you're able to communicate with them in English. Although, if you so wish, you can enable settings from the in-game menu that let you experience parts of the game in Japanese (or romaji). These settings can be toggled on or off at any time, so players that want to turn Tinymon into a full-fledged learning experience can enjoy toggling these settings on at their own pace, as they become more comfortable with their Japanese skills (which you'll have opportunities to learn and practice in the game). Of course, you can leave all of these settings off, and experience the full game in English. Alternatively, you can toggle all of these settings on, and experience the game in complete Japanese.
Tinymon's world setting is greatly inspired by Japanese culture, meaning you can learn about the real world Japan. Thus, Tinymon provides for a laid back experience that focuses on exploration, and education of Japan's locations, customs, culture, and language (to those that are willing). We will even teach you how to use the trains system, some things you should avoid doing in Japan, and the first things you should do after landing in the Japanese airport! (Some of them even should be done before leaving the airport).

name: Gloomy Eyes: The Game
description: Within a world where the sun has stopped rising, the darkness awoke the dead from their graves, and an oppressive leader has cast them out. Play Gloomy and Nena, a zombie and a human , on a quest to find the sun in this dark but poetic narrative puzzle game.

name: FBC: Firebreak
description: FBC: Firebreak is a 3-player cooperative first-person shooter set within the enigmatic Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). As the Bureau’s headquarters faces a deadly and prolonged siege by otherworldly forces, only Firebreak—its most adaptable response unit—has the skills and courage to restore order.

name: The Legend of Baboo
description: Young Sepehr and his loveable dog, Baboo, set off on a harrowing quest to save their family from the mystical forces of an ancient evil. Embark on an action-adventure, story-driven journey and explore a vast, magical world caught in a battle between light and dark.

name: Mistfall Hunter
description: Mistfall Hunter is a third-person action PvPvE extraction RPG. Gear up for different classes, master combos and strategic skills, and face intense battles against monsters or players, solo or with teammates. Only a successful escape will secure your treasures.

name: Subnautica 2
description: Dive into uncharted waters in Subnautica 2, the hotly-anticipated sequel to Subnautica and Subnautica: Below Zero. Adventure alone or with friends as you try to survive on an all-new mysterious alien planet.

name: Cronos: The New Dawn
description: Cronos: The New Dawn is a pulse-pounding, third-person survival horror game that throws you into the heart of a deadly struggle against overwhelming foes, all while uncovering the mysteries of a twisted time travel story.

name: The Paddock
description: Stop a carnivorous dinosaur from breaking out into the wild. Use CCTV surveillance throughout their night shift to watch over the dinosaur, electrocuting it whenever it gets too close to the fences. During the day, explore the map unravelling the mystery of how the dinosaur ended up in the woods.

name: Take Off Mask
description: is a strategic action RPG where you can enjoy dozens of unit battles. Exploration and combat can reveal the secrets of the mysterious world, find hidden colleagues, and challenge the wider area. challenge the Devil of the North with the best combat power.

name: Decksplorers: Into the Shell
description: Dive into the world of Decksplorers: Into the Shell, where deckbuilding card combat meets real-time action in a thrilling roguelite adventure! Master the art of strategic card play, swift reflexes, and exploration as you venture into the mysterious ever-changing caves of "The shell"

name: Delta
description: ∆ is an atmospheric exploration experience that takes you on a journey through the dream world into the Beyond.

name: Doggy Waiter 2
description: Stack the dishes with energizing casual fun! Plates, cups, mugs, and more as high as you can but don't let them drop! Then help the doggy waiter get them to the kitchen safely.

name: Bonding, Now
description: A black-and-white stylized collection of visual novel stories with pixel graphics gameplay and lineart artwork. Experience how new bonds are created, how they evolve, twist and change. Complete with a separate open-ended adventure mode.

name: The Villainess Quits
description: "The Villainess Quits" is a multi-ending romance simulation game. As the villainess Emily, handle various problems, alleviate family pressure, and reverse hostile relationships at school. Can Emily become an outstanding graduate and win recognition? Every choice impacts her future.

name: Owl Force
description: Lead the legendary Owl Force and your wingmates on an epic journey defending the galaxy against the nefarious Darktail Order. Take on missions, upgrade your ship, and engage in heart-pounding battles to uncover the hidden secrets of the universe.

name: Terrifier: The ARTcade Game
description: Terrifier: The ARTcade Game, a bloody retro fighting beat em up with frenetic action and a lot of fun and references to the Terrifier franchise.

name: Bylina
description: Embark on an epic journey to the Far Far Kingdom and challenge Koschei the Deathless to save your immortal soul and become a true hero in Bylina, an Action RPG rooted in Slavic folklore and myths. Take on the role of Falconet, a young bogatyr born without hero's powers, shunned and underestimated by almost everyone. Conquer numerous ordeals, overcome insurmountable odds, and become a legendary hero whose tales will be told for ages to come.

name: Sunderfolk
description: Sunderfolk is a couch co-op turn-based tactical RPG where one to four players adventure together through the magical and dangerous Sunderlands.

name: Alex's Journey to the Grave
description: Alex's Journey to the Grave is a visual novel about a boy trapped by fate and a girl in dire need of a friend. Help guide them through some of the hardest decisions of their lives as they experience warmth, connection, tragedy, the inevitability of death... and the antics of a mysterious black cat.

name: Pilot Light
description: Navigate through pitch-dark caverns with only the light of the rocket engine as you journey to the center of the universe.

name: Beyond Astra
description: Beyond Astra is a real-time 4X sci-fi grand strategy game. Expand your own civilization, explore captivating and mysterious planets and star clusters, interact with your citizens and other life forms and shape your destiny through nearly infinite possibilities.

name: Nitro Gen Omega
description: A Spaghetti Anime turn-based tactical RPG where you lead a crew of mercenaries through wastelands overrun by ruthless machines. Engage in high-octane cinematic Mech battles, recruit pilots and grow relationships. Play solo or join an online world where every character is procedurally generated.

name: Pathologic 3
description: Save a town from a mysterious plague in this in narrative first-person RPG. Learn the stories of its unusual inhabitants. Shape their lives with your decrees. Diagnose patients. Face the Plague. Connect the dots. Find out who killed the immortal man. Correct your mistakes in the past.

name: Island Keeper
description: Earth's pollution is at record highs and only you can save your planet! Collect rubbish, recycle; improve yourself and your base. Explore the archipelago of islands in the endless ocean, its inhabitants as well as the underwater world.

name: Mad Miner 2
description: The second game of Mad Miner, a dystopia where humans are forced to live in mines, takes place in the third dimension! Our main character joins the research team as a miner on a mission to dig deeper with his pickaxe.

name: Pao Pao
description: Pao Pao is a wild mix of culinary diving and animal madness—where you become the ultimate restaurant boss and management guru! Gather ingredients, go fishing, and expand your spot solo or with friends. Every order turns into an epic adventure… Jump in and experience it for yourself!

name: DistortedCode: Seija no Nokoriga
description:
DistortedCode is a Japanese horror otome game in development for the Nintendo Switch.

"I am––
about to be killed soon."

It's the end of June, and summer vacation is just around the corner.
The students are in high spirits as the longest break of the year approaches. In stark contrast to them is a girl with a cold, resigned look in her eyes.

That girl has a secret.

name: Sepulchron
description: An atmospheric puzzle-horror game where you have 72 in-game hours to escape with your life. Solve challenging puzzles that require logical deduction during the day, survive assaults from hostile ghosts at night, and uncover the mystery behind Astor Manor.

name: Tearscape
description:
Discover a Gothic world in this 2D top-down action-adventure, blending fast-paced combat, exploration, and pixel art inspired by Game Boy Color classics. Fight monstrous foes, unlock new abilities, and explore a non-linear map filled with hidden secrets and dangerous challenges.

Master precise combat, where every strike and dodge matters. Strategically manage your stamina by carefully considering each move as you face off against grotesque enemies. You have a limited number of healing flasks—use them wisely and plan your moments to recover carefully. Upgrade your character's stats to remain effective and competitive in combat.

Discover powerful items hidden in the dungeons that enhance both combat and exploration. Unlock new abilities to defeat enemies more effectively and access hidden paths, uncovering deeper secrets within the world.

Uncover hidden dungeons throughout Tearscape's dark, interconnected world. Each dungeon holds unique challenges, powerful items, and deadly enemies, pushing your combat and exploration skills to the limit.

Face off against challenging bosses—massive, grotesque creatures born from dark experiments. Each encounter demands precise timing, strategy, and mastery of your abilities to emerge victorious.

Explore the vast, interconnected map filled with branching paths, hidden shortcuts, and secret areas. The non-linear design encourages exploration, rewarding you with powerful items and new abilities.

Encounter a diverse cast of NPCs, some offering guidance, others seeking your help, and a few with their own hidden agendas. Every interaction adds depth to the story.

name: Söldner-X Complete Collection
description: The Söldner-X Complete Collection is a compilation of two critically acclaimed shoot'em up games in one collection.

name: DuneCrawl
description: DuneCrawl is an online coop action-adventure game where players take on the roles of desert faring privateers. Together, players explore the dust seas by piloting their Dune Crawler, a gigantic walking crustacean festooned with cannons and treasure maps.

name: Ten Ten
description: Ten Ten is a unique game that combines shooting, puzzles, and bullet-dodging.

name: Hark the Ghoul
description: Slash, kick and magick your way through an adventure brimming with secrets and curious encounters! HARK THE GHOUL offers a meticulously handcrafted world to explore, inspired by the interconnected nature of the first DARK SOULS.

name: Entwine
description: A first person psychological horror game. Experience a hand-crafted singleplayer campaign, or partner up with up to 4 players in a cooperative horror adventure.

name: Regeneration
description: Regeneration is a third-person survival horror game where you explore an abandoned post-Soviet complex as a scientist. Isolated from the outside world, you face anomalous creatures born from past experiments. Survive, uncover dark secrets, and stop the nightmare before it consumes everything.

name: Detective of the Dead
description: In this narrative noir adventure game you are a detective in the colorful Mexican underworld and must prevent a conspiracy to ruin the classic Día de los Muertos forever. Investigate & use your wit to solve many cases, puzzles, mini-games. Your trusted magic companion dog Xolo is there to help!

name: Nebula Strike
description: Sin descripción

name: The Vanished Soul
description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian
description: Offline game that will features a new protagonist and story set in the same world as the original "Atelier Resleriana" gacha game.

name: Rogue Factory
description: This factory-building action roguelike challenges you to master the art of spell-crafting and survive relentless waves of monsters. Create alchemical generators to power your automated spells and unleash destruction on the battlefield.

name: Orendale
description: Sin descripción

name: Bramble Royale: A Meteorfall Story
description: Bramble Royale is a wild, no-holds barred card brawl in the wacky world of Meteorfall. Build a face-melting deck, break the rules, and stomp your opponents in this fast-paced & fresh take on roguelike deckbuilders.

name: Hirogami
description: Explore a beautiful origami world as Hiro, a fan-wielding master of the art of ‘folding’. Embark on a mystical journey to save your fragile home from deadly digital invaders. Take on animal forms to traverse the landscape, solve puzzles, overcome enemies, and save the realm.

name: Kaya's Prophecy
description: Kaya’s Prophecy is a unique village builder where you establish your tribe, gather resources, and craft tools and buildings in a vibrant world. Explore and combat various challenges and other tribes in this vibrant, deck-builder roguelite while appeasing your god to earn his favour.

name: Automaton Heart
description: Automaton Heart presents a world unlike any you've seen in a computer game before. Enter the RPG sequel to Automaton Lung, now with a detailed organ management system, many dungeons and overworld areas, experience system and equipment upgrades, plus more.

name: Tanuki: Pon's Summer
description: The Tanuki Festival is just a month away, and the shrine is in disrepair. Follow Pon, a well meaning, if a bit lazy Tanuki with a part-time job at the Post Office, as he works to restore the shrine before summer ends. Deliver packages, make friends, and get the shrine ready for the big festival!

name: Illusion Box
description: "Illusion Box" is the first virtual reality entertainment project of the 21st century. However, malicious rumors and computer virus infections forced the company to shut down the project. Now, the long-abandoned "Illusion Box" devices are being reactivated...

name: Stario: Haven Tower
description: Build a vertical city in a world of a tower. Lead the dwellers to gather resources from the sky and build upwards. Make vertical transport and climbs up. Explore the creatures and sceneries in higher skies.

name: Detective Nekko
description: Mystery adventure where no one dies. Use your “ability to see too much” to uncover an inconvenient truth.

name: M.E.M.O
description: Rely on nothing but your own wits. A first-person cryptographic adventure game that play with paper and pen. As you wander through the maze of memories, can you find the key to saving the future?

name: Ghost of Yotei
description:
The game takes place 300 years after Ghost of Tsushima. Set in the lands surrounding Mount Yōtei, a towering peak in the heart of Ezo, an area of Japan known as Hokkaido in present day.

The area is outside the rule of Japan, and filled with sprawling grasslands, snowy tundras, and unexpected dangers.

name: Mörk Borg Heresy Supreme
description: Mörk Borg Heresy Supreme is a doom-metal action RPG set in the world of Mörk Borg. Wretched antiheroes explore a side-scrolling, semi-procedural grimdark fantasy world, searching for a way to prevent the apocalypse or make the suffering worse.

name: Primordialis
description: Primordialis is a physics-based roguelike fish builder. Unleash your creativity to defeat creatures using venomous tentacles, electrical shocks, or exploding children. The possibilities are endless. Explore the primordial depths to reveal its secrets and discover what lies beyond.

name: Exista!
description: EXISTA! offers a journey of a child through intriguing challenges and obstacles. In the role of the child, you must overcome obstacles using your natural abilities. As you progress, new skills are acquired, enabling you to face increasingly complex challenges.

name: Battlefield
description:
A new Battlefield is set to return to the "Modern Setting" in 2025:
• "Back to basics approach"
• 64 player maps
• No specialists, traditional classes are back
• Head of Respawn & Group GM for EA Studios Organization Vince Zampella: "We have to get back to the core of what Battlefield is and do that amazingly well [referencing BF3-BF4]"

name: Kanade
description: An upcoming visual novel from Frontwing in partnership with Good Smile Company.

name: The Depths of Despair
description: Get ready to unleash your inner warrior as you battle goblins, demons, orcs, and more in a thrilling souls-like adventure. Your quest is to help an angel named Amelia find her sister, who has been captured by demonic entities.

name: Space Adventure Cobra: The Awakening
description: Play as Cobra, the space pirate, in an action platformer adapted from the famous anime series. Along with Lady Armaroid, your loyal partner, and equipped with your iconic Psychogun, you must solve a mysterious threat hanging over the entire universe.

name: Laundry
description: A "Heisei retro" 3D horror game set in a 1990s Japanese laundromat.

name: BloomTale
description: BloomTale is a cozy flower shop simulation game where creativity meets management. Arrange beautiful flower compositions that speak the language of flowers, manage your shop, and satisfy your customers in a world of blooming possibilities.

name: Ionization
description:
IONIZATION is a work-in-progress singleplayer 3D first-person shooter action and post-apocalyptic standalone video game, based on a custom Half-Life 1 SDK known as PrimeXT SDK and running on Xash3D FWGS engine. The main idea originated in 2011, being inspired by the Half-Life series, the modification Paranoia and other creations of the BuZZeR level designer.

An Intro Demo version was released on March 5th, 2024. It is an opening part of the storyline, which takes about 15 minutes to complete. This build performs an introductory function and it does not reflect the final quality of the project.

name: Yumezame no Kasetsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Transparent Her and Real Me
description: This game is a bishoujo game developed and published by Kawayi Play.

name: Triku
description: Meet Triku, a flying action-adventure platformer that's made for fans of Monster World IV and Shantae. Set in an undescribed world, you must work through tasks with wide difficulty for each area and cute spooky characters to dialog to for more information about the game.

name: Dice, Destiny and Death
description: Fairy tales were truth, Koschei has awakened, and along with him, all the unclean creatures. Hut on chicken legs, nymphs, water spirits, and other beings may seem cute, but only until they have fed on your flesh. We don’t need a hero, we need someone who will survive!

name: Missing Banban
description: Grab your weapons and delve into this action side-scroller intense adventure. Jump around and explore the insane levels. Shoot and dodge your way through enemies. Fight to find your friend and solve the disappearance!

name: The Royal Office of Magick Affairs
description: A dark, tactical RPG, set in a Shelleyan London filled with arcane mysteries to solve, artefacts to recover and beasts to defeat. Guide your team of exorcists and inventors through the darkest corners of Victorian London and try not to lose your mind!

name: Worldseekers
description:
Worldseekers is a GPS exploration RPG. Discover rare cards, events, and unique characters as you delve into the expansive lands and deceptive dungeons of this world.

To help encourage mental and physical health, Worldseekers uses GPS mechanics and links to a phone app to help you get outside and walking. Of course, the Steam version allows you to play from your PC for hours while still rewarding you for taking an extra stroll. For all you streamers out there, we adjust / hide location by default.

name: Pompeii: The Legacy
description: Rebuild the city of Pompeii and climb the social ladder. Roman society is full of intrigues that you have to solve in order to become a powerful ruler.

name: Coromon: Rogue Planet
description: Choose your starter Coromon, upgrade your gear, then battle your way across the wilderness of Velua in a modern-day Monster Tamer with a Roguelite twist! Tame monsters, battle Crimsonite bosses, and uncover the secrets of the galaxy!

name: Atre: Dominance Wars
description: Attain the powers of a God and dominate in this lore-driven 4X game full of unique species. Evolve your units to command diverse armies. Develop magnificent cities. Research and master arcane spellcraft to lay waste to the world itself. Find your own path to power and Ascend above all else.

name: Undergrounded
description: “Undergrounded” is a puzzle adventure where you explore a dungeon formed by the accumulation of American history. Become Scott, who wandered underground in search of his lost engagement ring after failing to propose to his girlfriend, and plumb the depths of the past itself with your buddy Canary!

name: Hungry Horrors
description: Face legendary creatures from British and Irish folklore in this roguelite deck builder where cooking replaces combat. As a princess, you must prepare dishes to feed these monsters or risk becoming their next meal.

name: Match In Peace
description: In this terrifying, genre-busting strategy game, find and match monster pairs to unleash their terror on your enemies. Battle in PvP, conquer the Tower and Roguelike modes and find alchemy components to craft new powerful monsters. Can you keep your calm under pressure and Match In Peace?

name: Find Us Cats
description: Find Us Cats is a new hidden object game starring our favorite feline companions! Find dozens of cats in each level and aim for a high score in Level 1 of our free demo, the Planetarium.

name: Shadows of the Werewolf
description: Shadows of the Werewolf is a cinematic, third-person action-adventure game that places players in a suspenseful, horror-filled world. The story unfolds across various locations, including a suburban home and a mysterious forest retreat, where an innocent couple faces a relentless werewolf and other monstrous creatures. Players will engage in tense exploration, object interaction, and combat, using stealth and strategy to hide, fight, and escape from supernatural threats. The game blends elements of classic horror films and survival horror games, offering a narrative-driven, single-player experience filled with fear, suspense, and the challenge of survival under the full moon.

name: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter
description: A remake of the first installment in the main Trails series, serving as the beginning to the Liberl arc and the series as a whole. The game follows protagonists Estelle Bright and her adopted brother Joshua, who journey through the country of Liberl to train to become senior Bracers, members of a non-government multinational organization that acts to keep the peace and protect civilians.

name: Morsels
description: Morsels is a fast-paced creature collecting roguelite with a rotating roster of characters to switch between at will. Overcome a clique of killer cats as you fight your way out of the sewers in this unique, action-packed journey.

name: Coffee Talk: Tokyo
description: Coffee Talk: Tokyo is the newest instalment of the beloved coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator. It brings the warmth, heart, and delicious drinks from the previous games to an all-new café in Tokyo where humans and yokai alike share their stories.

name: Orbo's Exodus
description:
After a whirlwind odyssey with his friend, our accountant-turned-hero Orbo decides to make his way home by way of Peeb's signature biplane. While flying over the coast of a mysterious vacation resort, Peeb's attempt to demonstrate a cool loop-de-loop turns into a spectacular nosedive that is only one-upped by the resulting explosion.

Following the crash, Orbo is left stranded, with Peeb nowhere in sight. Left to his own devices, Orbo begins an all-new quest to buy a ferry back to the mainland, but in the process he may discover there's more to the island than meets the eye...

Armed with some new moves and a set of snazzy hats, Orbo sets out on his final adventure: an exodus of epic proportions.

name: Fatal Run 2089
description: Atari’s Fatal Run 2089 delivers over-the-top driving action across a post-apocalyptic landscape. You’ll have to race against a countdown clock at incredibly high-speeds and destroy enemy vehicles by any means necessary. Fail to complete your missions and you put humanity in jeopardy.

name: Kokubyaku no Avesta: Aushedar
description:
Under the world of the first Divine Throne, two forces are killing each other relentlessly. Black and White, Light and Darkness, Good and Evil. Until the other is destroyed, the fighting will never stop. That is the instinct called Avesta.
Follow the wicked warrior Magsarion and his path of remorseless breaking dualism, along with Quinn, who is tasked with collecting a "miracle".

This is the first installment in a two-part visual novelization of the light novel by Masada Takashi, serving as a prequel to his earlier visual novel "Paradise Lost".

name: Brute Horse
description: Sin descripción

name: Onward: Asylum
description: Going onwards as we escape this horrific asylum— an indie 2D horror sidescroller where your task is to get out of the facility without getting captured by the monster itself.

name: Guilty: Takiko's Nightmare
description: Guilty: Takiko's Nightmare is a single-player story-based game. Play as Takiko to explore several areas inside her unique reality. Players can interact with various objects, solve puzzles, fight enemies, or discover some unreal phenomena.

name: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die
description: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die is an action-packed, rogue-lite adventure in the world of Random. Play as Queen Aleksandra and wield her living die-companion Fortune, as they go all in against the ancient evil that took everything from her.

name: Park Ranger Simulator
description: Manage your own park facility in a huge open world in Park Ranger Simulator. Take on all the tasks that need to be completed as a park ranger - alone or together in cross-platform multiplayer! You have a variety of vehicles and equipment at your disposal to complete the challenges ahead!

name: Sigilfarer
description: Sigilfarer is a roguelite adventure where every decision rests on the roll of your dice. Master a dice-building system while navigating a sprawling, procedurally generated world. Strategize your route, manage resources and push your luck to the limit!

name: Galactic Economy
description: Can you become a leader in the Galactic Economy? Buy spaceships and spacestations on you way to get some additional income. Roll the dice and see what you can achieve in this board game.

name: Will: Follow the Light
description: Dive into a realistic, single-player, first-person journey through the harsh northern latitudes as you sail endless waters, searching for a way back to your loved ones. Will you follow the light?

name: Floatopia
description: Discover all the beloved elements of life simulation games—farming, fishing, logging, and decorating your dream home. With a sprinkle of magic to sweep away your worries, set sail on your very own floating island and journey through a world of superpowers!

name: Deadly Days: Roadtrip
description:
Deadly Days: Roadtrip is an exciting action roguelite, that combines reverse bullet hell gameplay with strategic inventory management.

Start your road trip through the zombie apocalypse! Fight your way through, gain experience and collect items to assemble an epic inventory.

Craft more effective weapons and find out what items you can combine to withstand the ever-increasing waves of zombies.

name: Project_Structure_01
description: Project_Structure_01 is first-person exploration game focusing on atmosphere and exploration of surreal liminal spaces that feature brutalist architecture.

name: Barkour
description: Step into the paws of a brave, four-legged special agent! In BARKOUR, you work for a secret organization where all agents are exceptionally skilled animals brought together by one goal: to save the world from the forces of evil (and mischievous cats)!

name: Umblight
description: Umblight is a deckbuilder roguelite where you must combine cards to overpower your opponents. Travel through dark environments, find treasure, build your special deck filled with unique skills, and battle the creatures you meet along the way in this DND inspired adventure!

name: Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone
description: Explore the mysterious open world of the Chornobyl Exclusion Zone in this post-apocalyptic action RPG adventure. Craft your story by facing sinister hazards and monsters. Survive furious encounters with the help of your crafted weaponry, developed skills, gathered teammates, and supported factions

name: Pikmin: Return to PNF-404
description: Sin descripción

name: The Super Mario Bros. Movie Game
description: Experience and play through the highest grossing animated movie of 2023 in an all new epic way through an action packed retro story driven 2D Platformer!

name: Gaming Raiding
description: Third-person shooter games
